02 注解

1、Annotation其实就是代码里的特殊标记，它用于替代配置文件，也就是说，传统方式通过配置文件告诉类如何运行，有了注解技术后，开发人员可以通过注解告诉类如何运行。

2、三个基本的Annotation：
@Override：限定重写父类方法，该注解只能用于方法。
@Deprecated：用于表示某个程序元素（类，方法等）已过时。
@SuppressWarnings：抑制编译器警告。

3、开发人员应该掌握什么：
* 编写注解
* 解析注解，并根据注解信息去运行程序

4、
由上面的提示信息可以看到注解的属性只能是原始类型、String、Class、annotation、enumeration以及它们的一维数组。

5、定义Annotation 使用@interface关键字
特殊属性value[]，在赋值的时候可以直接赋值{1,2,3}。

6、代码：
cn.itheima.Gender;
public enum Gender {
       男,女 ;
}

cn.itheima.MyAnnotation3.java
public @interface MyAnnotation3 {
      String value();
}

cn.itheima.MyAnnotation2.java;
public @interface MyAnnotation2 {
      String name();
}

cn.itheima.MyAnnotation.java;
@Target(ElementType.METHOD)
@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
public @interface MyAnnotation {
      String name() default "flx" ;
       int age() default 37;
      Gender gender() default Gender.男;
       MyAnnotation2 my2() default @MyAnnotation2(name= "wq");
      Class clazz() default List.class ;
      
       int[] arr() default {1,2};
      
}

cn.itheima.servlet1.java
public class Servlet1 {
      
       @MyAnnotation(name="zxx" ,age=39,gender=Gender.男,my2= @MyAnnotation2(name="myanno" ),clazz=String.class,arr={1,2,3})
       public void aa(){
            
      }
      
       @MyAnnotation
       public void bb(){
            
      }
      
       @MyAnnotation3("aaa" )
       public void cc(){
            
      }
}

7、JDK的元Annotation
元Annotation指修饰Annotation的Annotation。JDK中定义了如下元Annnotation：
@Retention：只能用于修饰一个Annotation定义，用于指定该Annotation可以保留的域，@Rentention包含一个RententionPolicy类型的成员变量，通过这个变量指定域。
RetentionPolicy.CLASS:编译器将注解记录在class文件中，当运行Java程序时，JVM不会保留注解，这是默认值。
@RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME:编译器将把注释记录在class文件中，当运行Java程序时，JVM会保留注释，程序可以通过反射获取该注解。
@RetentionPolicy.SOURCE:编译器直接丢弃这种策略的注释。

8、注解可以加在TYPE(类)、FIELD、METHOD、PARAMETER、CONSTRUCTOR、LOCAL_VARIABLE上。

9、JDK的元Annotation2
@Target：指定注解用于修饰类的哪个成员。@Target包含了一个名为value，类型为ElementType的成员变量。
@Documented:用于指定被该元Annotation修饰的Annotation类将被javadoc工具提取成文档。
@Inherited:被它修饰的Annotation将具有继承性。如果某个类使用了被@Inherited修饰的Annotation，则其子类将自动具有该注解。

10、应用注解的Demo 
cn.itheima.DBInfo.java
@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
public @interface DBInfo {
      String url();
      String username();
      String password();
      String driver();
}

cn.itheima.JDBCUtils.java
public class JDBCUtils {

       @DBInfo(url="jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test" ,driver="com.mysql.jdbc.driver",username= "root",password="sorry" )
       public static void getConnection() throws Exception{
            Class clazz = JDBCUtils. class;
            Method method = clazz.getMethod("getConnection", null);
             DBInfo info = method.getAnnotation( DBInfo.class );
            System. out.println(info.driver());
            System. out.println(info.url());
      }
      
       public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
            JDBCUtils. getConnection();
      }
}

03 设计SimpleWebFrameWork

为什么编写一个自己的Web框架，传统web编程模型有什么不好？
* 一个请求对应一个servlet，导致servlet过多，web.xml文件特别大，维护起来麻烦。
* 即使采用根据请求参数method在servlet里派发的方式，以减少servlet的个数。但这种方式也要求在每个servlet中写上很多重复if…else…代码。
* Servlet的映射地址写在web.xml文件中，工程大时，如果映射地址发生修改，修改起来特别麻烦。
* 更为重要的是，servlet调用由web服务器负责，开发人员要控制servlet的调度，以加入一些类似于权限控制的功能特别困难。

SimpleWebFrameWork的特点
* 由一个中央控制器ControllerServlet处理所有的请求，并根据请求uri，派发不同的action进行处理。
* 全注解配置，处理请求的action由注解配置其映射地址。
* 支持method请求参数，根据客户机带来的method，调用action的相应方法进行处理，以减少action的数量。

难点：自动扫描类路径，并通过自定义类装载器加载所有处理请求的action，并且关联到相应的处理uri上。

04 SimpleWebFrameWork核心代码

cn.itheima.web.annotation.Control.java
@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
public @interface Control {
      String value();
}

cn.itheima.web.action.BookAction.java
@Control("/product/book" )
public class BookAction {

       public void exec(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response){
            System. out.println("BookAction_exec" );
      }
      
       public void add(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response){
            System. out.println("add" );
      }
      
       public void del(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response){
            System. out.println("del" );
      }
}

cn.itheima.web.framework.ControllerServlet.java
public class ControllerServlet extends HttpServlet {

       private Map<String, Object> map = new HashMap<String, Object>();
      
       @Override
       public void init() throws ServletException{
             //扫描整个工程的ACTION
            String classPath = this.getServletContext().getRealPath("/WEB-INF/classes" );
            scanAction( new File(classPath));
      }
      
       private class MyClassLoader extends ClassLoader {
            
             //这里一定要为自己写的类加载器指定一个父类加载器，否则，在加载action的时候，无法加载java基本类，例如它的父类，Object。
             //当指定了父类加载器之后，那么首先会交给父类加载需要加载的类，加载不了的再自己加载
             public MyClassLoader(ClassLoader parent){
                   super(parent);
            }
            
             public Class load(String path){
                   try {
                        ByteArrayOutputStream baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
                        InputStream fis = new FileInputStream(path);
                         byte[] buffer = new byte[1024];
                         int len = 0;
                         while((len=(fis.read(buffer)))>0){
                              baos.write(buffer, 0, len);
                        }
                        baos.close();
                        fis.close();
                        
                         byte[] b = baos.toByteArray();
                         return super .defineClass(null, b, 0, b. length);
                  } catch (Exception e) {
                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
                  }
            }
      }
      
       private void scanAction(File file) {
             try{
                   if(file.isFile()){
                         if(file.getName().endsWith(".class" )){
                              String path = file.getPath();
                              
                              MyClassLoader loader = new MyClassLoader(ControllerServlet.class .getClassLoader());
                              Class clazz = loader.load(path);
                        
                               //判断这个类是不是action
                               Control control = (Control)clazz.getAnnotation(Control .class);
                               if(control != null){
                                     map.put(control.value(), clazz.newInstance());
                              }
                        }
                  } else{
                        File[] files = file.listFiles();
                         for(File child : files){
                              scanAction(child);
                        }
                  }
            } catch(Exception e){
                   throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }
      }

       public void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
                   throws ServletException, IOException {
            
            request.setCharacterEncoding( "UTF-8");
            
             //获取uri
            String uri = request.getRequestURI();
             //获取uri中的可以定位action的信息
            String path = uri.substring(request.getContextPath().length(),uri.length()-3);
             //定位action
            Object action = map.get(path);
            
             //定位失败，抛出异常
             if(action==null){
                   throw new RuntimeException("根据'" + uri + "'找不到对应的action!" );
            }
            
             //获取uri中的method
            String methodName = request.getParameter( "method");
             //如果访问的uri没有明确指定，那么默认执行exec方法
             if(methodName == null){
                  methodName = "exec";
            }
            
            Method method = null;
            
             try {
                   //利用反射获取Method对象，如果没有找到，那么抛出异常
                  method = action.getClass().getMethod(methodName, HttpServletRequest.class , HttpServletResponse.class);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                  System. out.println(action.getClass().getName() + "中找不到" + methodName + "方法");
            }
            
             try {
                   //这里这个执行时抛出的异常一定不能放在上面的异常处理代码之中，否则由于抛出的异常信息不正确，极有可能会误导用户，所以需要把用户原有的执行中抛出的异常错误，继续抛出
                  method.invoke(action, request, response);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }
      }

       public void doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
                   throws ServletException, IOException {
            doGet(request, response);
      }

}

/WEB-INF/web.xml
<?xml version ="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<web-app version ="2.4"
       xmlns="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee
      http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee/web-app_2_4.xsd" >
  <servlet >
    <servlet-name >ControllerServlet</ servlet-name>
    <servlet-class> cn.itheima.web.framework.ControllerServlet</servlet-class >
      <load-on-startup >1</ load-on-startup>
  </servlet >

  <servlet-mapping >
    <servlet-name >ControllerServlet</ servlet-name>
    <url-pattern >*.do</ url-pattern>
  </servlet-mapping >
 
  <welcome-file-list >
    <welcome-file >index.jsp</ welcome-file>
  </welcome-file-list >
</web-app>

dbcpconfig.properties
#连接设置
driverClassName=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
url=jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/itheimaoa
username=root
password=sorry

#<!-- 初始化连接 -->
initialSize=10

#最大连接数量
maxActive=50

#<!-- 最大空闲连接 -->
maxIdle=20

#<!-- 最小空闲连接 -->
minIdle=5

#<!-- 超时等待时间以毫秒为单位 6000毫秒/1000等于60秒 -->
maxWait=60000


#JDBC驱动建立连接时附带的连接属性属性的格式必须为这样：[属性名=property;]
#注意："user" 与 "password" 两个属性会被明确地传递，因此这里不需要包含他们。
connectionProperties=useUnicode=true;characterEncoding=utf8

#指定由连接池所创建的连接的自动提交（auto-commit）状态。
defaultAutoCommit=true

#driver default 指定由连接池所创建的连接的只读（read-only）状态。
#如果没有设置该值，则“setReadOnly”方法将不被调用。（某些驱动并不支持只读模式，如：Informix）
defaultReadOnly=

#driver default 指定由连接池所创建的连接的事务级别（TransactionIsolation）。
#可用值为下列之一：（详情可见javadoc。）NONE,READ_UNCOMMITTED, READ_COMMITTED, REPEATABLE_READ, SERIALIZABLE
defaultTransactionIsolation=READ_COMMITTED

cn.itheima.utils.JdbcUtils.java
public class JdbcUtils {

       private static DataSource ds;
      
       static{
             try{
                  Properties prop = new Properties();
                  InputStream in = JdbcUtils.class.getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("dbcpconfig.properties");
                  prop.load(in);
            
                   ds = BasicDataSourceFactory.createDataSource(prop);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new ExceptionInInitializerError(e);
            }
      }
      
       public static DataSource getDataSource(){
             return ds ;
      }
      
}

cn.itheima.utils.WebUtils.java
public class WebUtils {
       public static <T> T request2Bean(HttpServletRequest request,Class<T> clazz){
             try {
                  Map map = request.getParameterMap();
                  T bean = clazz.newInstance();
                  BeanUtils. populate(bean, map);
                   return bean;
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }
      }
}

06 CusomterDao和CustomerDaoImpl

cn.itheima.exception.DaoException.java
public class DaoException extends RuntimeException {

       public DaoException() {
             super();
      }

       public DaoException(String arg0, Throwable arg1) {
             super(arg0, arg1);
      }

       public DaoException(String arg0) {
             super(arg0);
      }

       public DaoException(Throwable arg0) {
             super(arg0);
      }

}

cn.itheima.dao.customer.CustomerDao.java
public interface CustomerDao {
       void add(Customer c);
      
      Customer find(String id);
      
       void delete(String id);
      
      List getAll();

      QueryResult pageQuery( int startindex, int pagesize, String where,
                  Object[] whereParams);

      QueryResult pageQuery( int startindex, int pagesize);

      QueryResult pageQuery(String where, Object[] whereParams);
}

cn.itheima.dao.customer.CustomerDaoImpl.java
public class CustomerDaoImpl implements CustomerDao {

       public void add(Customer c) {
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "insert into customer(id,name,gender,cellphone,qq,email,address,infoSource,customerStatus,message,regTime) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)" ;
                  Object params[] = {c.getId(),c.getName(),c.getGender(),c.getCellphone(),c.getQq(),c.getEmail(),c.getAddress(),c.getInfoSource(),c.getCustomerStatus(),c.getMessage(),c.getRegTime()};
                  qr.update(sql,params);
            } catch(Exception e){
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

       public void delete(String id) {
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "delete from customer where id=?" ;
                  qr.update(sql, id);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

       public Customer find(String id) {
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from customer where id=?" ;
                   return (Customer) qr.query(sql, id, new BeanHandler(Customer.class ));
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

       public List getAll(){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from customer";
                   return (List) qr.query(sql, new BeanListHandler(Customer.class ));
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

}

07 分页查询

cn.itheima.bean.PageInfo.java
//用于封装分页请求信息
public class PageInfo {

       private int currentpage ;
       private int pagesize ;
       private int startindex ;
      
       public int getCurrentpage() {
             return currentpage ;
      }
       public void setCurrentpage(int currentpage) {
             this.currentpage = currentpage;
      }
       public int getPagesize() {
             return pagesize ;
      }
       public void setPagesize(int pagesize) {
             this.pagesize = pagesize;
      }
       public int getStartindex() {
             this.startindex = (this. currentpage-1)*this .pagesize ;
             return startindex ;
      }
      
}

cn.itheima.bean.PageBean.java
public class PageBean {
      
       private List list ;
       private int totalrecord ;
       private int pagesize ;
       private int totalpage ;
       private int currentpage ;
       private int previouspage ;
       private int nextpage ;
       private int pagebar [];
      
       public List getList() {
             return list ;
      }
       public void setList(List list) {
             this.list = list;
      }
       public int getTotalrecord() {
             return totalrecord ;
      }
       public void setTotalrecord(int totalrecord) {
             this.totalrecord = totalrecord;
      }
       public int getPagesize() {
             return pagesize ;
      }
       public void setPagesize(int pagesize) {
             this.pagesize = pagesize;
      }
       public int getTotalpage() {
            
             if(this .totalrecord %this.pagesize==0){
                   this.totalpage = this. totalrecord/this .pagesize ;
            } else{
                   this.totalpage = this. totalrecord/this .pagesize + 1;
            }
             return totalpage ;
      }
       public int getCurrentpage() {
             return currentpage ;
      }
       public void setCurrentpage(int currentpage) {
             this.currentpage = currentpage;
      }
       public int getPreviouspage() {
             this.previouspage = this. currentpage-1;
             if(this .previouspage <1){
                   this.previouspage = 1;
            }
             return previouspage ;
      }
       public int getNextpage() {
             this.nextpage = this. currentpage + 1;
             if(this .nextpage >this. totalpage){
                   this.nextpage = this. totalpage;
            }
             return nextpage ;
      }
       public int [] getPagebar() {
            
             //17   11    20    17-7+1
             //25   21    30    25-5+1
             //5    1     10    5-5+1
            
             int startpage = this.currentpage - this.currentpage %10 + 1;
             int endpage = startpage + 9;
            
             if(endpage>this.totalpage){
                  endpage = this.totalpage ;
            }
            
             int pagebar[] = new int[endpage-startpage+1];    //  21 22 23 24 25 0 0 0 0 0
             int index = 0;
             for(int i=startpage;i<=endpage;i++){   //21  25
                  pagebar[index++] = i;
            }
            
             return pagebar;
      }
      
}

08 Customer涉及的Dao和DaoImpl

cn.itheima.dao.customer.impl.CustomerDaoImpl.java
public class CustomerDaoImpl implements CustomerDao {

       public void add(Customer c) {
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "insert into customer(id,name,gender,cellphone,qq,email,address,infoSource,customerStatus,message,regTime) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)" ;
                  Object params[] = {c.getId(),c.getName(),c.getGender(),c.getCellphone(),c.getQq(),c.getEmail(),c.getAddress(),c.getInfoSource(),c.getCustomerStatus(),c.getMessage(),c.getRegTime()};
                  qr. update(sql,params);
            } catch(Exception e){
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

       public void delete(String id) {
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "delete from customer where id=?" ;
                  qr.update(sql, id);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

       public Customer find(String id) {
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from customer where id=?" ;
                   return (Customer) qr.query(sql, id, new BeanHandler(Customer.class ));
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

       public List getAll(){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from customer";
                   return (List) qr.query(sql, new BeanListHandler(Customer.class ));
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

       // where = "where name=? and regTime>? and regTIme<?"
       public QueryResult pageQuery(int startindex,int pagesize,String where,Object whereParams[]){
            
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  QueryResult queryResult = new QueryResult();
                  List list = null;
                   int totalrecord = 0;
                  String sql = null;
                  
                   if(where==null){
                         //没带条件
                         if(startindex<0){
                               //没条件又不分页
                              sql =  "select * from customer";
                              list = (List) qr.query(sql, new BeanListHandler(Customer.class ));
                        } else{
                               //没条件分页
                              sql =  "select * from customer limit ?,?" ;
                              list = (List) qr. query(sql,new Object[]{startindex,pagesize}, new BeanListHandler(Customer.class));
                        }
                        sql = "select count(*) from customer" ;
                        totalrecord = ((Long)qr.query(sql, new ScalarHandler())).intValue();
                  } else{
                         //带了条件
                         if(startindex<0){
                               //有条件，不分页
                              sql = "select * from customer " + where;
                              list = (List) qr. query(sql, whereParams, new BeanListHandler(Customer.class));
                        } else{
                               //有条件，分页
                              sql = "select * from customer " + where + " limit ?,?";
                              Object params[] = new Object[whereParams.length + 2];
                               for(int i=0;i<whereParams.length;i++){
                                    params[i] = whereParams[i];
                              }
                              params[params. length-2] = startindex;
                              params[params. length-1] = pagesize;
                              
                              list = (List) qr. query(sql, params, new BeanListHandler(Customer.class ));
                        }
                        sql = "select count(*) from customer " + where;
                        totalrecord = ((Long)qr. query(sql, whereParams, new ScalarHandler())).intValue();
                  }
                  
                  queryResult.setList(list);
                  queryResult.setTotalrecord(totalrecord);
                   return queryResult;
            
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
       public QueryResult pageQuery(String where,Object whereParams[]){
             return pageQuery(-1,-1,where,whereParams);
      }
      
       public QueryResult pageQuery(int startindex,int pagesize){
             return pageQuery(startindex, pagesize,null,null);
      }
      
       public QueryResult pageQuery(){
             return pageQuery(-1, -1,null,null);
      }
}

daoConfig.properties

InfoSourceDao=com.itheima.dao.customer.impl.InfoSourceDaoImpl

cn.itheima.utils.DaoFactory.java
public class DaoFactory {

       private static DaoFactory instance = new DaoFactory();
       private Properties daoConfig = new Properties();
       private DaoFactory(){
            
            InputStream in = DaoFactory.class .getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("daoConfig.properties");
             try {
                   daoConfig.load(in);
            } catch (IOException e) {
                   throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }
      };
      
       public static DaoFactory getInstance(){
             return instance ;
      }
      
      
       public <T> T createDao(Class<T> daoType){
            String daoName = daoType.getSimpleName();  //CustomerDao
            String className = daoConfig.getProperty(daoName);
             try {
                   return (T) Class.forName(className).newInstance();
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }
      }
}

cn.itheima.service.customer.CustomerService.java
public class CustomerService {

       private CustomerDao customerDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(CustomerDao. class);
       private CustomerStatusDao customerStatusDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(CustomerStatusDao. class);
       private InfoSourceDao infoSourceDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(InfoSourceDao. class);
      
       public void addCustomer(Customer customer){
            customer.setId(UUID. randomUUID().toString());
             customerDao.add(customer);
      }
      
       public Customer findCustomer(String id){
             return customerDao .find(id);
      }
      
       public PageBean pageQuery(PageInfo pageInfo,String where,Object whereParams[]){
            
            QueryResult queryResult = customerDao.pageQuery(pageInfo.getStartindex(), pageInfo.getPagesize(), where, whereParams);
            
            PageBean pageBean = new PageBean();
            pageBean.setCurrentpage(pageInfo.getCurrentpage());
            pageBean.setList(queryResult.getList());
            pageBean.setPagesize(pageInfo.getPagesize());
            pageBean.setTotalrecord(queryResult.getTotalrecord());
            
             return pageBean;
      }
      
       public PageBean pageQuery(PageInfo pageInfo){
            
            QueryResult queryResult = customerDao.pageQuery(pageInfo.getStartindex(), pageInfo.getPagesize());
            
            PageBean pageBean = new PageBean();
            pageBean.setCurrentpage(pageInfo.getCurrentpage());
            pageBean.setList(queryResult.getList());
            pageBean.setPagesize(pageInfo.getPagesize());
            pageBean.setTotalrecord(queryResult.getTotalrecord());
            
             return pageBean;
      }

       public PageBean pageQuery(String where,Object whereParams[]){
            
            QueryResult queryResult = customerDao.pageQuery(where, whereParams);
            
            PageBean pageBean = new PageBean();
            pageBean.setList(queryResult.getList());
            pageBean.setTotalrecord(queryResult.getTotalrecord());
            
             return pageBean;
      }

       //提供客户状态相关的服务
       public void addCustomerStatus(CustomerStatus c){
            c.setId(UUID. randomUUID().toString());
             customerStatusDao.add(c);
      }
      
       public CustomerStatus findCustomerStatus(String id){
             return customerStatusDao .find(id);
      }
      
       public List getAllCustomerStatus(){
             return customerStatusDao .getAll();
      }
      
       //提供信息来源相关的服务
       public void addInfoSource(InfoSource infoSource){
            infoSource.setId(UUID. randomUUID().toString());
             infoSourceDao.add(infoSource);
      }
      
       public InfoSource findInfoSource(String id){
             return infoSourceDao .find(id);
      }
      
       public List getAllInfoSource(){
             return infoSourceDao .getAll();
      }
      
}

如果xtree.js想要访问到页面就必须通过../js/images/*.png进入图片区。
由于js中不能识别${pageContext.request.contextPath}这样的EL表达式，所以必须通过相对路径得到图片。

建表：
create database itheimaoa;

use itheimaoa;

create table customer
(
     id varchar(40) primary key,
     name varchar(40) not null,
     gender varchar(4) not null,
     cellphone varchar(20) not null,
     qq varchar(20) not null,
     email varchar(100) not null,
     address varchar(255),
     customerStatus varchar(40) not null,
     infoSource varchar(40),
     message varchar(255),
     regTime datetime
);

create table customerStatus
(
     id varchar(40) primary key,
     name varchar(40) not null
);


create table infoSource
(
     id varchar(40) primary key,
     name varchar(40) not null
);

cn.itheima.web.action.customer.CustomerRegisterAction.java
@Control("/customer/register" )
public class CustomerRegisterAction {
       public void register(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/register.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
      
       public void doRegister(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{

            CustomerFormBean customerFormBean = WebUtils.request2Bean(request, CustomerFormBean. class);
             if(customerFormBean.validate()){
                  
                  Customer customer = new Customer();
                   BeanUtils.copyProperties(customer, customerFormBean);
                  
                  CustomerService customerService = new CustomerService();
                  customerService.addCustomer(customer);
                  
                  request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/registerInfo.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
            }
      }
}

      function checkName() {

             var span = document.getElementById("s1" );
             //应该是2-10位的中文，中文区间[\u4e00-\u9fa5]
             if(!name.match(/^[\u4e00-\u9fa5] {2,10 }$/)) {
                   span.innerHTML = "姓名要大于2位中文";
                   return false;
             }else{
                   span.innerHTML = "";
                   return true;
             }
      }

            var b1 = checkName();
             return b1;
      }

12 分页显示客户信息并且可以更改页面大小

cn.itheima.bean.PageInfo.java
//用于封装分页请求信息
public class PageInfo {

       private int currentpage = 1;
       private int pagesize = 10;
       private int startindex ;
      
       public int getCurrentpage() {
             return currentpage ;
      }
       public void setCurrentpage(int currentpage) {
             this.currentpage = currentpage;
      }
       public int getPagesize() {
             return pagesize ;
      }
       public void setPagesize(int pagesize) {
             this.pagesize = pagesize;
      }
       public int getStartindex() {
             this.startindex = (this. currentpage-1)*this .pagesize ;
             return startindex ;
      }
      
}

cn.itheima.bean.PageBean.java
public class PageBean {
      
       private List list ;
       private int totalrecord ;
       private int pagesize ;
       private int totalpage ;
       private int currentpage ;
       private int previouspage ;
       private int nextpage ;
       private int pagebar [];
      
       public List getList() {
             return list ;
      }
       public void setList(List list) {
             this.list = list;
      }
       public int getTotalrecord() {
             return totalrecord ;
      }
       public void setTotalrecord(int totalrecord) {
             this.totalrecord = totalrecord;
      }
       public int getPagesize() {
             return pagesize ;
      }
       public void setPagesize(int pagesize) {
             this.pagesize = pagesize;
      }
       public int getTotalpage() {
            
             if(this .totalrecord %this.pagesize==0){
                   this.totalpage = this. totalrecord/this .pagesize ;
            } else{
                   this.totalpage = this. totalrecord/this .pagesize + 1;
            }
             return totalpage ;
      }
       public int getCurrentpage() {
             return currentpage ;
      }
       public void setCurrentpage(int currentpage) {
             this.currentpage = currentpage;
      }
       public int getPreviouspage() {
             this.previouspage = this. currentpage-1;
             if(this .previouspage <1){
                   this.previouspage = 1;
            }
             return previouspage ;
      }
       public int getNextpage() {
             this.nextpage = this. currentpage + 1;
             if(this .nextpage >this. totalpage){
                   this.nextpage = this. totalpage;
            }
             return nextpage ;
      }
       public int [] getPagebar() {
            
             //17   11    20    17-7+1
             //25   21    30    25-5+1
             //5    1     10    5-5+1
            
             int startpage = this.currentpage - (this.currentpage %10==0?10:this. currentpage%10) + 1;
             int endpage = startpage + 9;
            
             if(endpage>this.totalpage){
                  endpage = this.totalpage ;
            }
            
             int pagebar[] = new int[endpage-startpage+1];    //  21 22 23 24 25 0 0 0 0 0
             int index = 0;
             for(int i=startpage;i<=endpage;i++){   //21  25
                  pagebar[index++] = i;
            }
            
             return pagebar;
      }
      
}

cn.itheima.web.action.customer.CustomerAction.java
@Control("/control/customer/customer" )
public class CustomerAction {
       private CustomerService customerService = new CustomerService();

       public void list(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{

            PageInfo pageInfo = WebUtils. request2Bean(request, PageInfo.class);
            PageBean pageBean = customerService.pageQuery(pageInfo);
            request.setAttribute( "pageBean", pageBean);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/listCustomer.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
}

public class InsertCustomerData {

                  customer.setAddress( "aaa" + i);

                  customer.setCustomerStatus( "大一");

                  customer.setGender( "男");
                  customer.setInfoSource( "csdn");
                  customer.setMessage( "hahha" + i);
                  customer.setName( "xxx" + i);
                  customer.setQq( "2121");
                  customer.setRegTime( new Date());
                  dao.add(customer);
            }
      }
}

public class CustomerQueryFormBean {

             return cellphone ;
      }
       public void setCellphone(String cellphone) {
             this.cellphone = cellphone;
      }
       public String getQq() {
             return qq ;
      }
       public void setQq(String qq) {
             this.qq = qq;
      }
       public String getStartDate() {
             return startDate ;
      }
       public void setStartDate(String startDate) {
             this.startDate = startDate;
      }
       public String getEndDate() {
             return endDate ;
      }
       public void setEndDate(String endDate) {
             this.endDate = endDate;
      }
       public String getInfoSource() {
             return infoSource ;
      }
       public void setInfoSource(String infoSource) {
             this.infoSource = infoSource;
      }
      
       // where = where name=?
       public WhereAndPrams bulidWhere(){
            
            StringBuffer sb = new StringBuffer();
            ArrayList list = new ArrayList();
            sb.append( " where 1=1 ");
            
             if(name !=null && !name.trim().equals( "")){
                  sb.append( "and name like ? ");
                  list.add( "%" + name + "%");
            }
             if(cellphone !=null && !cellphone.trim().equals( "")){
                  sb.append( "and cellphone=? ");
                  list.add( cellphone);
            }
             if(qq !=null && !qq.trim().equals( "")){
                  sb.append( "and qq=? ");
                  list.add( qq);
            }
             if(startDate !=null && !startDate.trim().equals( "")){
                  sb.append( "and regTime>=? ");
                  list.add( startDate);
            }
             if(endDate !=null && !endDate.trim().equals( "")){
                   try{
                        SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd" );
                        Date date = sdf.parse( endDate);
                        
                        Calendar calendar = Calendar. getInstance();
                        calendar.setTime(date);
                        calendar.add(Calendar. DAY_OF_MONTH, 1);
                        date = calendar.getTime();
                        
                        sb.append( "and regTime<=? ");  //3.25 0
                        list.add(date);
                  } catch (Exception e) {
                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
                  }
            }
             if(infoSource !=null && !infoSource.trim().equals( "")){
                  sb.append( "and infoSource=? ");
                  list.add( infoSource);
            }
            String where = sb.toString();
            Object params[] = list.toArray();
            
             return new WhereAndPrams(where,params);
      }
      
       public class WhereAndPrams{
             private String where ;
             private Object[] params ;
            
            
             public WhereAndPrams() {
                   super();
                   // TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
            }
             public WhereAndPrams(String where, Object[] params) {
                   super();
                   this.where = where;
                   this.params = params;
            }
             public String getWhere() {
                   return where ;
            }
             public void setWhere(String where) {
                   this.where = where;
            }
             public Object[] getParams() {
                   return params ;
            }
             public void setParams(Object[] params) {
                   this.params = params;
            }
      }
}

cn.itheima.web.action.customer.CustomerAction.java
@Control("/control/customer/customer" )
public class CustomerAction {
       private CustomerService customerService = new CustomerService();

       public void list(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{

            PageInfo pageInfo = WebUtils. request2Bean(request, PageInfo.class);
            PageBean pageBean = customerService.pageQuery(pageInfo);
            request.setAttribute( "pageBean", pageBean);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/listCustomer.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
      
       public void query(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/query.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
      
       public void doQuery(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            PageInfo pageInfo = WebUtils.request2Bean(request,PageInfo. class);
            CustomerQueryFormBean customerQueryFormBean = WebUtils.request2Bean(request, CustomerQueryFormBean. class);
            WhereAndPrams whereAndPrams = customerQueryFormBean.bulidWhere();
            
            PageBean pageBean = customerService.pageQuery(pageInfo, whereAndPrams.getWhere(), whereAndPrams.getParams());
            request.setAttribute( "pageBean", pageBean);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/queryResult.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
}

function trim(str){
     return str.replace(/(^\s*)|(\s*$)/g, "");
}

      function gotopage(currentpage) {
            
            var queryForm = document.queryForm;
            
             var i1 = document.createElement("input" );
            i1.type = "hidden";
            i1.name = "currentpage";
            i1.value = currentpage;
            queryForm.appendChild(i1);

             var i2 = document.createElement("input" );
            i2.type = "hidden";
            i2.name = "pagesize";
            i2.value = pagesize;
            queryForm.appendChild(i2);
            
            
            queryForm.submit();
      }
   
      function changesize(input){

@Control("/control/customer/infoSource" )
public class InfoSourceAction {
      
       private CustomerService customerService = new CustomerService();
      
       public void list(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
             //ctrl + 2   L
            List list = customerService.getAllInfoSource();
            request.setAttribute( "list", list);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/listInfoSource.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
      
       public void add(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/addInfoSource.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }

       public void doAdd(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            InfoSource infoSource = WebUtils. request2Bean(request, InfoSource.class );
             customerService.addInfoSource(infoSource);
            request.setAttribute( "message", "添加成功！！" );
            request.setAttribute( "returnURL", request.getContextPath() + "/control/customer/infoSource.do?method=list" );
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/commons/message.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
}

@Control("/control/customer/customerStatus" )
public class CustomerStatusAction {
      
       private CustomerService customerService = new CustomerService();
      
       public void list(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
             //ctrl + 2   L
            List list = customerService.getAllCustomerStatus();
            request.setAttribute( "list", list);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/listCustomerStatus.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
      

       public void add(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/addCustomerStatus.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }

       public void doAdd(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            CustomerStatus  customerStatus= WebUtils.request2Bean(request, CustomerStatus. class);
             customerService.addCustomerStatus(customerStatus);
            request.setAttribute( "message", "添加成功！！" );
            request.setAttribute( "returnURL", request.getContextPath() + "/control/customer/customerStatus.do?method=list" );
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/commons/message.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }

}

@Control("/customer/register" )
public class CustomerRegisterAction {
      
       public void register(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            CustomerService customerService = new CustomerService();
            List allCustomerStatus = customerService.getAllCustomerStatus();
            List allInfoSource = customerService.getAllInfoSource();
             request.setAttribute("allCustomerStatus",allCustomerStatus);
             request.setAttribute("allInfoSource",allInfoSource);
            
             request.getRequestDispatcher("/WEB-INF/pages/customer/register.jsp").forward( request, response);
      }
      

       public void doRegister(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{

            CustomerFormBean customerFormBean = WebUtils.request2Bean(request, CustomerFormBean. class);
             if(customerFormBean.validate()){
                  
                  Customer customer = new Customer();
                  BeanUtils. copyProperties(customer, customerFormBean);
                  
                  CustomerService customerService = new CustomerService();
                  customerService.addCustomer(customer);
                  
                  request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/registerInfo.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
                  
            }
      }
}

17 Apache-POI

导入poi-3.7-20101029.jar

ExportExcelUtils.java
public class ExportExcelUtils {
       /**
       * @param title：excel文件名称
       * @param headers：表头
       * @param dataset：要保存到表格的对象集合
       * @param attrList：对象要保存的属性
       * @param out：输出目的地
       */
       public static void exportExcel(String title, String[] headers, Collection dataset,String attrList[], OutputStream out) {
            
             // 声明一个工作薄
            Workbook workbook = new HSSFWorkbook();
            
             // 生成一个表格
            Sheet sheet = workbook.createSheet(title);
            
             // 设置表格默认列宽度为15
            sheet.setDefaultColumnWidth(( short) 15);
            
             // 产生表头
            Row row = sheet.createRow(0);
            
             //插入表头数据
             for (short i = 0; i < headers.length; i++) {
                  Cell cell = row.createCell(i);
                   //设置样式
                  cell.setCellStyle(createHeaderStyle(workbook));
                  HSSFRichTextString text = new HSSFRichTextString(headers[i]);
                  cell.setCellValue(text);
            }

             int index = 1;
             for(Object bean : dataset){
                   //得到一个bean，则生成表格的一行
                  row = sheet.createRow(index++);
                   for(int i=0;i<attrList.length;i++){
                        PropertyDescriptor pd = null;
                         try{
                              pd = new PropertyDescriptor(attrList[i],bean.getClass());
                        } catch (Exception e) {
                               throw new RuntimeException("bean中没有属性：" + attrList[i]);
                        }
                        
                         //得到bean的属性值
                        Object attrValue = null;
                         try {
                              attrValue = pd.getReadMethod().invoke(bean, null );
                        } catch (Exception e) {
                               throw new RuntimeException("无法获取bean的属性值：" + pd.getName());
                        }
                        
                         //转成字符串
                        String cellValue = "";
                         if(attrValue instanceof Date){
                              SimpleDateFormat df = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd" );
                              df.format(attrValue);
                        } else{
                               if(attrValue!=null){
                                    cellValue = attrValue.toString();
                              }
                        }
                        
                        Cell cell = row.createCell(i);
                        cell.setCellStyle(createDataStyle(workbook));
                        cell.setCellValue(cellValue);
                  }
            }
             try {
                  workbook.write(out);
            } catch (IOException e) {     
                   throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }
      }
      
       private static CellStyle createHeaderStyle(Workbook workbook){
             // 生成一个样式
            CellStyle style = workbook.createCellStyle();

             // 设置表头的样式
            style.setFillForegroundColor(HSSFColor.BLUE.index);
            style.setFillPattern(HSSFCellStyle.SOLID_FOREGROUND);
            style.setBorderBottom(HSSFCellStyle.BORDER_THIN);
            style.setBorderLeft(HSSFCellStyle.BORDER_THIN);
            style.setBorderRight(HSSFCellStyle.BORDER_THIN);
            style.setBorderTop(HSSFCellStyle.BORDER_THIN);
            style.setAlignment(HSSFCellStyle.ALIGN_CENTER);

             // 生成表头的字体
            Font font = workbook.createFont();
            font.setColor(HSSFColor.VIOLET.index);
            font.setFontHeightInPoints(( short) 12);
            font.setBoldweight(HSSFFont.BOLDWEIGHT_BOLD);
             // 把字体应用到当前的样式
            style.setFont(font);
             return style;
      }
      
       private static CellStyle createDataStyle(Workbook workbook){
            
             // 生成数据行的样式
            CellStyle style = workbook.createCellStyle();
            style.setBorderBottom(HSSFCellStyle.BORDER_THIN);
            style.setBorderLeft(HSSFCellStyle.BORDER_THIN);
            style.setBorderRight(HSSFCellStyle.BORDER_THIN);
            style.setBorderTop(HSSFCellStyle.BORDER_THIN);
            style.setAlignment(HSSFCellStyle.ALIGN_CENTER);
            style.setVerticalAlignment(HSSFCellStyle.VERTICAL_CENTER);
             // 生成数据行的字体
            Font font = workbook.createFont();
            font.setBoldweight(HSSFFont.BOLDWEIGHT_NORMAL);
             // 把字体应用到当前的样式
            style.setFont(font);
             return style;
      }

}

cn.itheima.web.action.customer.CustomerAction.java
@Control("/control/customer/customer" )
public class CustomerAction {
       private CustomerService customerService = new CustomerService();

       public void list(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{

            PageInfo pageInfo = WebUtils. request2Bean(request, PageInfo.class);
            PageBean pageBean = customerService.pageQuery(pageInfo);
            request.setAttribute( "pageBean", pageBean);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/listCustomer.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
      
       public void query(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            CustomerService customerService = new CustomerService();
            List allInfoSource = customerService.getAllInfoSource();
            request.setAttribute( "allInfoSource",allInfoSource);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/query.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
      
       public void doQuery(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            PageInfo pageInfo = WebUtils.request2Bean(request,PageInfo. class);
            CustomerQueryFormBean customerQueryFormBean = WebUtils.request2Bean(request, CustomerQueryFormBean. class);
            WhereAndPrams whereAndPrams = customerQueryFormBean.bulidWhere();
            
            PageBean pageBean = customerService.pageQuery(pageInfo, whereAndPrams.getWhere(), whereAndPrams.getParams());
            request.setAttribute( "pageBean", pageBean);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/queryResult.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
      
       public void exportExcel(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            CustomerService customerService = new CustomerService();
            List allInfoSource = customerService.getAllInfoSource();
            request.setAttribute( "allInfoSource",allInfoSource);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/exportExcel.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }

       public void doExportExcel(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            CustomerQueryFormBean customerQueryFormBean = WebUtils.request2Bean(request, CustomerQueryFormBean. class);
            WhereAndPrams whereAndPrams = customerQueryFormBean.bulidWhere();
            
            PageBean pageBean = customerService.pageQuery(whereAndPrams.getWhere(), whereAndPrams.getParams());
             //得到向excel中写的数据
            List<Customer> list = pageBean.getList();
            
            String title = new Date().getTime() + ".xls" ;
            String headers[] = { "姓名","电话" ,"邮箱" };
            String attrList[] = { "name","cellphone" ,"email" };
            
            response.setHeader( "content-disposition", "attachment;filename=" + title);
            ExportExcelUtils. exportExcel(title, headers, list, attrList, response.getOutputStream());
      }
}

/WEB-INF/pages/customer/exportExcel.jsp
<%@ page language ="java" import="java.util.*" pageEncoding="UTF-8" %>
<%@taglib uri ="http://java.sun.com/jsp/jstl/core" prefix="c" %>
<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN">
<html>
  <head >
    <title >导出excel</ title>

18 权限管理-持久化类

cn.itheima.bean.privilege.Department.java
public class Department {

       private String id ;
       private String name ;
      
       public String getId() {
             return id ;
      }
       public void setId(String id) {
             this.id = id;
      }
       public String getName() {
             return name ;
      }
       public void setName(String name) {
             this.name = name;
      }
      
}

cn.itheima.bean.privilege.Employee.java
public class Employee {
      
       private String id ;
       private String username ;
       private String password ;
       private String realname ;
      
       private Department department ;
       private Set<Role> roles = new HashSet();

       public String getId() {
             return id ;
      }

       public String getUsername() {
             return username ;
      }

       public void setUsername(String username) {
             this.username = username;
      }

       public String getPassword() {
             return password ;
      }

       public void setPassword(String password) {
             this.password = password;
      }

       public String getRealname() {
             return realname ;
      }

       public void setRealname(String realname) {
             this.realname = realname;
      }

       public Department getDepartment() {
             return department ;
      }

       public void setDepartment(Department department) {
             this.department = department;
      }

       public Set<Role> getRoles() {
             return roles ;
      }

       public void setRoles(Set<Role> roles) {
             this.roles = roles;
      }

       public void setId(String id) {
             this.id = id;
      }
      
}

cn.itheima.bean.privilege.Role.java
public class Role {

       private String id ;
       private String name ;
      
       private Set privileges = new HashSet();

       public String getId() {
             return id ;
      }

       public void setId(String id) {
             this.id = id;
      }

       public String getName() {
             return name ;
      }

       public void setName(String name) {
             this.name = name;
      }

       public Set getPrivileges() {
             return privileges ;
      }

       public void setPrivileges(Set privileges) {
             this.privileges = privileges;
      }
      
}

cn.itheima.bean.privilege.Privilege.java
public class Privilege {

       private String id ;
       private String modelName ; 
       private String privilegeName ;
      
      
       public String getId() {
             return id ;
      }
       public void setId(String id) {
             this.id = id;
      }
      
       public String getModelName() {
             return modelName ;
      }
       public void setModelName(String modelName) {
             this.modelName = modelName;
      }
       public String getPrivilegeName() {
             return privilegeName ;
      }
       public void setPrivilegeName(String privilegeName) {
             this.privilegeName = privilegeName;
      }

}

19 权限管理-Dao与Service

注：在更新员工拥有的角色的时候一定要删除员工拥有的所有的角色，然后再进行添加。

cn.itheima.dao.privilege.DepartmentDao.java
public class DepartmentDaoImpl implements DepartmentDao {
      
       public void add(Department department){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "insert into department(id,name) values(?,?)";
                  Object params[] = {department.getId(),department.getName()};
                  qr.update(sql, params);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
       public Department find(String id){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from department where id=?" ;
                   return (Department) qr.query(sql, id, new BeanHandler(Department.class ));
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
       public List<Department> getAll(){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from department";
                   return (List<Department>) qr.query(sql, new BeanListHandler(Department.class ));
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
}

public class DepartmentDaoImpl implements DepartmentDao {

            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());

            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

cn.itheima.dao.privilege.impl.EmployeeDaoImpl.java
public class EmployeeDaoImpl implements EmployeeDao {
      
       public void add(Employee employee){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "insert into employee(id,username,password,realname,department_id) values(?,?,?,?,?)";
                  Object params[] = {employee.getId(),employee.getUsername(),employee.getPassword(),employee.getRealname(),employee.getDepartment()==null? null:employee.getDepartment().getId()};
                  qr.update(sql, params);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
                                //1
       public Employee find(String id){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from employee where id=?";
                  Employee e = (Employee) qr. query(sql , id, new BeanHandler(Employee.class ));
            
                   if(e!=null ){
                         sql = "select d.* from employee e,department d where e.id=? and d.id=e.department_id";
                        Department d = (Department) qr. query(sql , id, new BeanHandler(Department.class));
                        
                         sql = "select * from employee_role er,role r where er.employee_id=? and r.id=er.role_id";
                        List list = (List) qr. query(sql , id, new BeanListHandler(Role.class ));
                        
                        e.setDepartment(d);
                        e.getRoles().addAll(list);
                  }
                   return e;
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
            
      }
      
       public Employee find(String username,String password){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from employee where username=? and password=?";
                  Object params[] = {username,password};
                  Employee e = (Employee) qr. query(sql, params, new BeanHandler(Employee.class ));
            
                  
                   if(e!=null ){
                        sql = "select d.* from employee e,department d where e.id=? and d.id=e.department_id";
                        Department d = (Department) qr. query(sql, e.getId(), new BeanHandler(Department.class));
                        e.setDepartment(d);
                        
                        sql = "select r.* from employee_role er,role r where er.employee_id=? and r.id=er.role_id";
                        List list = (List) qr. query(sql, e.getId(), new BeanListHandler(Role.class ));
                        e.getRoles().addAll(list);
                  }
                   return e;
            
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
       public List<Employee> getAll(){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from employee";
                  List<Employee> list = (List) qr.query(sql, new BeanListHandler(Employee.class ));
                   for(Employee e : list){
                        sql = "select d.* from employee e,department d where e.id=? and d.id=e.department_id";
                        Department d = (Department) qr. query(sql, e.getId(), new BeanHandler(Department.class));
                        e.setDepartment(d);
                  }
                   return list;
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
       public void updateRole(Employee employee,List<Role> roles){
            
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  
                  String sql= "delete from employee_role where employee_id=?";
                  qr.update(sql, employee.getId());
                  
                   for(Role role : roles){
                        sql = "insert into employee_role(employee_id,role_id) values(?,?)";
                        Object params[] = {employee.getId(),role.getId()};
                        qr.update(sql, params);
                  }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

       public Employee findByName(String username) {
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from employee where username=?";
                  Employee e = (Employee) qr. query(sql, username, new BeanHandler(Employee.class ));
                   return e;
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
}

cn.itheima.dao.privilege.impl.RoleDaoImpl.java
public class RoleDaoImpl implements RoleDao {
      
       public void add(Role role){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "insert into role(id,name) values(?,?)" ;
                  Object params[] = {role.getId(),role.getName()};
                  qr.update(sql, params);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
       public Role find(String id){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from role where id=?" ;
                  Role role = (Role) qr. query(sql, id, new BeanHandler(Role.class ));
                  
                   if(role!=null){
                        sql = "select p.* from role_privilege rp,privilege p where rp.role_id=? and p.id=rp.privilege_id";
                        List list = (List) qr. query(sql, role.getId(), new BeanListHandler(Privilege.class));
                        
                        role.getPrivileges().addAll(list);
                  }
                   return role;
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
       public List<Role> getAll(){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from role";
                   return (List<Role>) qr.query(sql, new BeanListHandler(Role.class ));
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
       //给某个角色分配权限，给初始化方法用的
       public void updatePrivilege(Role role,List<Privilege> privileges){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                   //分配新的权限
                  String sql = "delete from role_privilege where role_id=?";
                  qr.update(sql, role.getId());
                        
                   for(Privilege p : privileges){
                        sql = "insert into role_privilege(role_id,privilege_id) values(?,?)";
                        Object params[] = {role.getId(),p.getId()};
                        qr.update(sql, params);
                  }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
            
      }
      
       public void updatePrivilegeByInit(Role role,List<Privilege> privileges){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                   for(Privilege p : privileges){
                        String sql = "insert into role_privilege(role_id,privilege_id) values(?,?)";
                        Object params[] = {role.getId(),p.getId()};
                        qr.update(sql, params);
                  }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

       public Role findByName(String name) {
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from role where name=?" ;
                  Role role = (Role) qr. query(sql, name, new BeanHandler(Role.class ));
                   return role;
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

       public boolean findRolePrivilegeByInit(String roleId, String privilegeId) {
            
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from role_privilege where role_id=? and privilege_id=?";
                  Object params[] = {roleId,privilegeId};
                  Object result[] =  (Object[]) qr. query(sql, params, new ArrayHandler());
                   if(result==null){
                         return false ;
                  }
                   return true ;
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
}

public class PrivilegeDaoImpl implements PrivilegeDao {

                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

                   throw new DaoException(e);

       public Privilege findByName(String modelName, String privilegeName) {

                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

cn.itheima.service.privilege.SecurityService.java
public class SecurityService {
      
       private DepartmentDao departmentDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(DepartmentDao. class);
       private EmployeeDao employeeDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(EmployeeDao. class);
       private PrivilegeDao privilegeDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(PrivilegeDao. class);
       private RoleDao roleDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(RoleDao. class);
       private CustomerDao customerDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(CustomerDao. class);
      
       /*****
       * 部门相关的操作
       ****/
       public void addDepartment(Department department){
            department.setId(UUID. randomUUID().toString());
             departmentDao.add(department);
      }
      
       public Department finDepartment(String id){
             return departmentDao .find(id);
      }
      
       public List<Department> getAllDepartment(){
             return departmentDao .getAll();
      }
      
      
       /*****
       * 员工相关的操作
       ****/
       public void addEmployee(Employee employee){
            employee.setId(UUID. randomUUID().toString());
             employeeDao.add(employee);
      }
      
       public Employee findEmployee(String id){
             return employeeDao .find(id);
      }
      
       public Employee findEmployeeByName(String username){
             return employeeDao .findByName(username);
      }
      
       public Employee findEmployee(String username,String password){
             return employeeDao .find(username,password);
      }
      
       //找出员工所有的权限
       public List<Privilege> findEmployeeAllPrivilege(Employee e){
            List allPrivilege = new ArrayList();
            
            Set<Role> roles = e.getRoles();
             for(Role role : roles){
                  allPrivilege.addAll( roleDao.find(role.getId()).getPrivileges());
            }
             return allPrivilege;
      }
      
       public List<Employee> getAllEmployee(){
             return employeeDao .getAll();
      }
      
       public void updateEmployeeRole(String employeeId,String roles[]){
            Employee e = employeeDao.find(employeeId);
            List<Role> list = new ArrayList();
             for(int i=0;roles!=null&&i<roles. length;i++){
                  Role role = roleDao.find(roles[i]);
                  list.add(role);
            }
             employeeDao.updateRole(e, list);
      }
      
       /*****
       * 角色相关的操作
       ****/
       public void addRole(Role role){
            role.setId(UUID. randomUUID().toString());
             roleDao.add(role);
      }
      
       public Role findRole(String id){
             return roleDao .find(id);
      }
      
       public List getAllRole(){
             return roleDao .getAll();
      }
      
       public void updateRolePrivilege(String roleId,String privileges[]){
            Role role = roleDao.find(roleId);
            List list = new ArrayList();
             for(int i=0;privileges!=null && i<privileges. length;i++){
                  Privilege p = privilegeDao.find(privileges[i]);
                  list.add(p);
            }
             roleDao.updatePrivilege(role, list);
            
      }
      
       public void updateRolePrivilegeByInit(String roleId,String privileges[]){
            Role role = roleDao.find(roleId);
            List list = new ArrayList();
             for(int i=0;privileges!=null && i<privileges. length;i++){
                  Privilege p = privilegeDao.find(privileges[i]);
                  list.add(p);
            }
             roleDao.updatePrivilegeByInit(role, list);
      }
      
      
       /*****
       * 权限相关的操作
       ****/
       public void addPrivilege(Privilege privilege){
            privilege.setId(UUID. randomUUID().toString());
             privilegeDao.add(privilege);
      }
      
       public Privilege findPrivilege(String id){
             return privilegeDao .find(id);
      }
      
       public Map<String,List<Privilege>> getAllPrivilege(){
            List<Privilege> list = privilegeDao.getAll();
            
            Map<String,List<Privilege>> map = new HashMap();
            
             for(Privilege p : list){
                  List<Privilege> l = map.get(p.getModelName());
                   if(l==null ){
                        l = new ArrayList();
                        l.add(p);
                        map.put(p.getModelName(), l);
                  } else{
                        l.add(p);
                  }
            }
             return map;
      }

       public Role findRoleByName(String name) {
             return roleDao .findByName(name);
      }

       public Privilege findPrivilegeByName(String modelName, String privilegeName) {
             return privilegeDao .findByName(modelName,privilegeName);
      }

       public boolean findRolePrivilegeByInit(String roleId, String privilegeId) {
             // TODO Auto-generated method stub
             return roleDao .findRolePrivilegeByInit(roleId,privilegeId);
      }

       /*public Customer findCustomer(String name, String cellphone) {
            return customerDao.find(name,cellphone);
      }*/
      
}

cn.itheima.web.action.privilege.DepartmentAction.java
@Control("/control/privilege/department" )
public class DepartmentAction {

       private SecurityService securityService = new SecurityService();

       public void list(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{

            List list = securityService.getAllDepartment();
            request.setAttribute( "list", list);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/privilege/listDepartment.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }

       public void add(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/privilege/addDepartment.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }

       public void doAdd(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            Department department = WebUtils. request2Bean(request, Department.class );
             securityService.addDepartment(department);
            request.setAttribute( "message", "添加成功" );
            request.setAttribute( "returnURL", request.getContextPath() + "/control/privilege/department.do?method=list" );
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/commons/message.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }

}

<%@ page language ="java" import="java.util.*" pageEncoding="UTF-8" %>
<%@taglib uri ="http://java.sun.com/jsp/jstl/core" prefix="c" %>
 
<html>
       <head>
             <title> 添加员工</title >
             <script type ="text/javascript" src=" ${pageContext.request.contextPath}/js/commons/flx.js" ></script>
             <link rel ="stylesheet" type="text/css" href=" ${pageContext.request.contextPath}/css/commons/globals.css" />
             <script type ="text/javascript" >
                   function check(){
                        var username = trim(document.getElementById("username" ).value);
                         var password = trim(document.getElementById("password" ).value);
                         var password2= trim(document.getElementById("password2" ).value);
                         var realname= trim(document.getElementById("realname" ).value);
                         var did= document.getElementsByName("did" );
                         if(username== "" || !username.match("[A-Za-z0-9]{6,}" )){
                               alert("用户名不合法");
                               return false;
                         }
                        if (password=="" || !password.match("[A-Za-z0-9]{6,}" )){
                               alert("密码不合法");
                               return false;
                         }
                        if (password!=password2){
                               alert("两次密码不一致");
                               return false ;
                         }
                        if (realname=="" || !realname.match("[\u4e00-\u9fa5]{2,6}" )){
                               alert("姓名不合法");
                               return false;
                         }
                        var flag = false;
                         for(var i=0;i<gender.length;i++){
                              if (gender[i].checked){
                                     flag = true;
                               }
                        }
                        if (!flag){
                               alert("性别必填");
                               return false;
                         }
                        
                        var flag2 = false;
                         for(var i=0;i<did.length;i++){
                              if (did[i].checked){
                                     flag2 = true;
                               }
                        }
                        if (!flag2){
                               alert("请选择一个部门");
                               return false;
                         }
                        return true ;
                   }
             </script>
       </head>
       <body>

cn.itheima.web.action.privilege.EmployeeAction.java
@Control("/control/privilege/employee" )
public class EmployeeAction {

       private SecurityService securityService = new SecurityService();

       public void list(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{

            List list = securityService.getAllEmployee();
            request.setAttribute( "list", list);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/privilege/listEmployee.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }

       public void add(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            List list = securityService.getAllDepartment();
            request.setAttribute( "list", list);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/privilege/addEmployee.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }

       public void doAdd(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            Employee employee = WebUtils. request2Bean(request, Employee.class);
            String department_id = request.getParameter("department_id" );
            Department department = securityService.finDepartment(department_id);
            employee.setDepartment(department);
            
             securityService.addEmployee(employee);
            
            request.setAttribute( "message", "添加成功" );
            request.setAttribute( "returnURL", request.getContextPath() + "/control/privilege/employee.do?method=list" );
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/commons/message.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }

       public void updateEmployeeRole(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            String employee_id = request.getParameter( "employee_id");
            Employee employee = securityService.findEmployee(employee_id);
            List list = securityService.getAllRole();
            
            request.setAttribute( "employee", employee);
            request.setAttribute( "list", list);
            
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/privilege/updateEmployeeRole.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
      
       public void doUpdateEmployeeRole(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            String employee_id = request.getParameter( "employee_id");
            String role_ids[] = request.getParameterValues( "role_id");
            
             securityService.updateEmployeeRole(employee_id, role_ids);
            request.setAttribute( "message", "更新成功！" );
            request.setAttribute( "returnURL", request.getContextPath() + "/control/privilege/employee.do?method=list" );
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/commons/message.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
}

执行效果：
