cn.itheima.web.action.privilege.RoleAction.java
@Control("/control/privilege/role" )
public class RoleAction {

       private SecurityService securityService = new SecurityService ();

       public void list(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{

            List list = securityService.getAllRole();
            request.setAttribute( "list", list);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/privilege/listRole.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }

       public void add(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/privilege/addRole.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }

       public void doAdd(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
      
            Role role = WebUtils. request2Bean(request, Role.class);
            
             securityService.addRole(role);
            
            request.setAttribute( "message", "添加成功" );
            request.setAttribute( "returnURL", request.getContextPath() + "/control/privilege/role.do?method=list" );
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/commons/message.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
      
       //
       public void updateRolePrivilege(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            String role_id = request.getParameter( "role_id");

            Role role = securityService.findRole(role_id);
            
            Map map = securityService.getAllPrivilege();
            
            request.setAttribute( "role", role);
            request.setAttribute( "map", map);
            
            
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/privilege/updateRolePrivilege.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }

       //
       public void doUpdateRolePrivilege(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            String role_id = request.getParameter( "role_id");
            String privileges[] = request.getParameterValues("privilege_id" );
            
             securityService.updateRolePrivilege(role_id, privileges);
            request.setAttribute( "message", "修改成功" );
            request.setAttribute( "returnURL", request.getContextPath() + "/control/privilege/role.do?method=list" );
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/commons/message.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
}

cn.itheima.bean.privilege.Employee.CheckLoginFilter.java
public class CheckLoginFilter implements Filter {


       public void doFilter(ServletRequest req, ServletResponse resp,
                  FilterChain chain) throws IOException, ServletException {

            HttpServletRequest request = (HttpServletRequest) req;
            HttpServletResponse response = (HttpServletResponse) resp;
            
            Employee employee = (Employee) request.getSession().getAttribute("employee" );
             if(employee==null){
                  response.sendRedirect(request.getContextPath() + "/login.do");
                   return;
            }
            
            chain.doFilter(request, response);
            
      }

       public void init(FilterConfig filterConfig) throws ServletException {

      }
      
       public void destroy() {

      }

}

cn.itheima.web.action.privilege.LoginAction.java
@Control("/login" )
public class LoginAction {

       private SecurityService securityService = new SecurityService();

       public void exec(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/privilege/login.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }

       public void doLogin (HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            String username = request.getParameter( "username");
            String password = request.getParameter( "password");
            
            Employee employee = securityService.findEmployee(username, password);
             if(employee==null){
                  request.setAttribute( "message", "登陆失败" );
                  request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/privilege/login.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
                   return;
            }
            request.getSession().setAttribute( "employee", employee);
            response.sendRedirect(request.getContextPath() + "/control/commons/main.do?method=main" );
      }

      
}

25 权限控制-细粒度编程-为Action的方法打上权限注解标记

cn.itheima.web.annotation.Permission.java
@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
public @interface Permission {

      String modelName();

      String privilegeName();

}

cn.itheima.web.action.customer.CustomerAction.java
@Control("/control/customer/customer" )
public class CustomerAction {

       private CustomerService customerService = new CustomerService();

       @Permission(modelName="客户模块" ,privilegeName="客户列表")
       public void list(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{

            PageInfo pageInfo = WebUtils.request2Bean(request, PageInfo.class);
            PageBean pageBean = customerService.pageQuery(pageInfo);
            request.setAttribute( "pageBean", pageBean);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/listCustomer.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
      

       @Permission(modelName="客户模块" ,privilegeName="查询客户")
       public void query(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            CustomerService customerService = new CustomerService();
            List allInfoSource = customerService.getAllInfoSource();
            request.setAttribute( "allInfoSource",allInfoSource);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/query.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
      

       @Permission(modelName="客户模块" ,privilegeName="查询客户")
       public void doQuery(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            PageInfo pageInfo = WebUtils.request2Bean(request,PageInfo. class);
            CustomerQueryFormBean customerQueryFormBean = WebUtils.request2Bean(request, CustomerQueryFormBean. class);
            WhereAndPrams whereAndPrams = customerQueryFormBean.bulidWhere();
            
            PageBean pageBean = customerService.pageQuery(pageInfo, whereAndPrams.getWhere(), whereAndPrams.getParams());
            request.setAttribute( "pageBean", pageBean);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/queryResult.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
      

       @Permission(modelName="客户模块" ,privilegeName="导出excel")
       public void exportExcel(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            CustomerService customerService = new CustomerService();
            List allInfoSource = customerService.getAllInfoSource();
            request.setAttribute( "allInfoSource",allInfoSource);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/customer/exportExcel.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
      

       public void doExportExcel(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            CustomerQueryFormBean customerQueryFormBean = WebUtils.request2Bean(request, CustomerQueryFormBean. class);
            WhereAndPrams whereAndPrams = customerQueryFormBean.bulidWhere();
            
            PageBean pageBean = customerService.pageQuery(whereAndPrams.getWhere(), whereAndPrams.getParams());
             //得到向excel中写的数据
            List<Customer> list = pageBean.getList();
            
            String title = new Date().getTime() + ".xls" ;
            String headers[] = { "姓名","电话" ,"邮箱" };
            String attrList[] = { "name","cellphone" ,"email" };
            
            response.setHeader( "content-disposition", "attachment;filename=" + title);
            ExportExcelUtils. exportExcel(title, headers, list, attrList, response.getOutputStream());
      }
}

      }

       @Permission(modelName="客户模块" ,privilegeName="添加客户状态")

            CustomerStatus  customerStatus= WebUtils.request2Bean(request, CustomerStatus. class);
             customerService.addCustomerStatus(customerStatus);
            request.setAttribute( "message", "添加成功！！" );

      }

}

cn.itheima.web.action.customer.InfoSourceAction.java
@Control("/control/customer/infoSource" )
public class InfoSourceAction {
      
       private CustomerService customerService = new CustomerService();
      
       @Permission(modelName="客户模块" ,privilegeName="信息来源列表")
       public void list(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{

            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/privilege/addEmployee.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }

26 在ControllerServlet中实现权限控制

cn.itheima.web.framework.ControllerServlet.java
public class ControllerServlet extends HttpServlet {

       private static Map<String,Object> map = new HashMap<String,Object>();
      
       //扫描整个工程的ACTION
       @Override
       public void init() throws ServletException {
            
             //得到类路径
            String classpath = this.getServletContext().getRealPath("/WEB-INF/classes" );
            scanAction( new File(classpath));
      }
      
       public void scanAction(File file){
            
             try{
                   if(file.isFile()){
                         //判断这个文件是不是一个class
                         if(file.getName().endsWith(".class" )){
                               //找到了一个类  c:\\tomcat\.......\BookAction.class
                              String path = file.getPath();
                              
                              MyClassLoader myClassLoader = new MyClassLoader(ControllerServlet.class .getClassLoader());
                              Class clazz = myClassLoader.load(path);
                              
                               //判断类是不是ACTION
                               Control control = (Control ) clazz.getAnnotation(Control .class);
                               if(control!=null){
                                     //找到一个action
                                     map.put(control.value(), clazz.newInstance());
                              }
                        }
                  } else{
                        File files[] = file.listFiles();
                         for(File child : files){
                              scanAction(child);
                        }
                  }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }
            
      }
      
       class MyClassLoader extends ClassLoader{
            
             public  MyClassLoader(ClassLoader parent){
                   super(parent);
            }
             public Class load(String path){
                   try{
                        ByteArrayOutputStream bout = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
                        FileInputStream in = new FileInputStream(path);
                         int len = 0;
                         byte buffer[] = new byte[1024];
                         while((len=in.read(buffer))>0){
                              bout.write(buffer, 0, len);
                        }
                        bout.close();
                        in.close();
                         byte b[] = bout.toByteArray();  //得到了类的字节码
                         return super .defineClass(null, b, 0, b. length);
                  
                  } catch (Exception e) {
                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
                  }
            }
            
      }
      
      
       public void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
                   throws ServletException, IOException {

            request.setCharacterEncoding( "UTF-8");
            
             //得到请求的uri   http://localhost:8080/day21/product/book.do?method=add  /day21/product/book.do
            String uri = request.getRequestURI();
            uri = uri.substring(request.getContextPath().length(), uri.length()-3);
            
             //得到处理uri的action
            Object action = map.get(uri);
             if(action==null){
                   throw new RuntimeException("找不到" + uri + "上对应的action" );
            }
            
            
             //得到客户机想调用的method
            String methodName = request.getParameter( "method");
             if(methodName==null){
                  methodName = "exec";
            }
            
             //反射action的方法
            Method method = null;
             try {
                  method = action.getClass().getMethod(methodName, HttpServletRequest.class ,HttpServletResponse.class);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new RuntimeException(action.getClass().getName() + "上找不到" + methodName + "方法");
            }
            
             try {
                  Employee employee = (Employee) request.getSession().getAttribute("employee" );
                   boolean b = checkPrivilege(employee,method);
                   if(b){
                        method.invoke(action, request,response);
                  } else{
                        request.setAttribute( "message", "没有权限，联系管理员" );
                        request.setAttribute( "returnURL", request.getContextPath() + "/control/commons/main.do?method=right" );
                        request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/commons/message.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
                  }
                  
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }
            
      }

       /**检查用户有无访问方法的权限*/
       private boolean checkPrivilege(Employee employee, Method method) {

             //1.检查方法上有没有配置访问权限
             Permission permission = method.getAnnotation(Permission .class);
            
             //2.如果没有，则return true
             if(permission==null) return true;
            
             //3.如果有，则得到用户所有的权限
            SecurityService securityService = new SecurityService();
            List<Privilege> employeeAllPrivilege = securityService.findEmployeeAllPrivilege(employee);
            
             //4.得到访问方法需要的权限
            Privilege privilege = new Privilege();
            privilege.setModelName(permission.modelName());
            privilege.setPrivilegeName(permission.privilegeName());
            
             //5.检查用户是否包含访问方法的权限
             return employeeAllPrivilege.contains(privilege);
            
      }

       public void doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
                   throws ServletException, IOException {

            doGet(request, response);
      }
      
       public static Map getActions(){
             return map ;
      }

}

cn.itheima.web.Privilege.java
public class Privilege {

       private String id;
       private String modelName;  //模块
       private String privilegeName;
      
      
       public String getId() {
             return id ;
      }
       public void setId(String id) {
             this.id = id;
      }
      
       public String getModelName() {
             return modelName ;
      }
       public void setModelName(String modelName) {
             this.modelName = modelName;
      }
       public String getPrivilegeName() {
             return privilegeName ;
      }
       public void setPrivilegeName(String privilegeName) {
             this.privilegeName = privilegeName;
      }
       @Override
       public int hashCode() {
             final int prime = 31;
             int result = 1;
            result = prime * result
                        + (( modelName == null ) ? 0 : modelName.hashCode());
            result = prime * result
                        + (( privilegeName == null ) ? 0 : privilegeName.hashCode());
             return result;
      }
       @Override
       public boolean equals(Object obj) {
             if (this == obj)
                   return true ;
             if (obj == null)
                   return false ;
             if (getClass() != obj.getClass())
                   return false ;
             final Privilege other = (Privilege) obj;
             if (modelName == null) {
                   if (other.modelName != null)
                         return false ;
            } else if (!modelName.equals(other. modelName))
                   return false ;
             if (privilegeName == null) {
                   if (other.privilegeName != null)
                         return false ;
            } else if (!privilegeName.equals(other. privilegeName))
                   return false ;
             return true ;
      }
      
}

27 初始化数据库以及管理员

cn.itheima.web.action.commons.InitSiteAction.java 
@Control("/093285092384092840928340824084320328409324809lisflsjlsdjfljfd" )
public class InitSiteAction {

       public void exec(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            response.setCharacterEncoding( "UTF-8");
            response.setContentType( "text/html;charset=UTF-8");
             try{
                  initSchema(request);
                  initPrivilegeData();
                  request. setAttribute("message", "初始化成功！" );
                  request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/commons/message.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                  response.getWriter().write(e.getMessage());
            }
      }
      
       public void initSchema(HttpServletRequest request){
            String file = request.getSession().getServletContext().getRealPath("/WEB-INF/classes/db.sql" );
             //   /c:\tomcat\......
             //file = file.substring(1);
            String command = "cmd /c mysql -uroot -proot <" + file;
             try {
                  Process process = Runtime. getRuntime().exec(command);
                  InputStream in = process.getErrorStream();
                   int len = 0;
                   byte buffer[] = new byte[1024];
                  StringBuffer sb = new StringBuffer();
                   while((len=in.read(buffer))>0){
                        sb.append( new String(buffer,0,len));
                  }
                  String error = sb.toString();
                   if(error.length()>0){
                         throw new RuntimeException(error);
                  }
                  
            } catch (IOException e) {
                   throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }
      }
      
       //md5  111111 彩虹碰撞 11111    1287287128172817
       private void initPrivilegeData(){
            
            SecurityService securityService = new SecurityService();
            
             //初始化一个管理员
            Role role = securityService.findRoleByName( "管理员");
             if(role==null){
                  role = new Role();
                  role.setName( "管理员");
                  securityService.addRole(role);
            }
            
            Employee employee = securityService.findEmployeeByName("admin" );
             if(employee==null){
                  employee = new Employee();
                  employee.setPassword( "111111");
                  employee.setRealname( "admin");
                  employee.setUsername( "admin");
                  
                  securityService.addEmployee(employee);
                  securityService.updateEmployeeRole(employee.getId(), new String[]{role.getId()});
            }
            
             //得到所有action
            Map<String,Object> map = ControllerServlet. getActions();
             for(Map.Entry<String, Object> entry : map.entrySet()){
                  Object action = entry.getValue();
                  Method methods[] = action.getClass().getMethods();
                   for(Method method : methods){
                         Permission permission = method.getAnnotation(Permission .class);
                         if(permission!=null){
                              String modelName = permission.modelName();
                              String privilegeName = permission.privilegeName();
                              Privilege privilege = securityService.findPrivilegeByName(modelName, privilegeName);
                               if(privilege==null){
                                    privilege = new Privilege();
                                    privilege.setModelName(modelName);
                                    privilege.setPrivilegeName(privilegeName);
                                    securityService.addPrivilege(privilege);
                                    securityService.updateRolePrivilegeByInit(role.getId(), new String[]{privilege.getId()});
                              }
                        }
                  }
            }
      }
}

28 安装JBPM的gpd插件

* 安装流程设计器gpd
  安装完成后检查Window—>Preference中是否有Jboss JBPM。 
  路径JBPM-4.4/install/src/gpd/jbpm-gpd-site.zip。
  安装完后重启eclipse。
* 流程图文件名为xxx.jpdl.xml，注意流程图文件名不要用中文文件名。
* 添加xml校验schema文件
  文件位置：jbpm-4.4\src\jpdl-4.4.xsd

30 使用JBPM进行开发

添加JAR包：jbpm.jar和JBPM_HOME/lib下的jar。
不要添加servlet-api.jar,junit.jar,数据库驱动包。
在tomcat中如果访问jsp出现javax/el/ExpressionFactory异常，则需要把juel.jar,juel-engine.jar,juel-impl.jar这三个包复制到tomcat的lib中，并删除原来的el-api.jar。还要把工程中的三个jar删除。

注意事项：
修改jbpm.hibernate.cfg.xml中的数据库连接信息，如果使用MySql，使用的方言一定要是org.hibernate.dialect.MySQL5InnoDBDialect。
数据库连接编码一定要是UTF-8.否则可能会在部署含有中文字符的流程定义时会抛异常，说sql语法错误。
修改logging.properties中的日志级别为WARNING：java.util.logging.ConsoleHandler.level=WARNING。

logging.properties
handlers= java.util.logging.ConsoleHandler
redirect.commons.logging = enabled

java.util.logging.ConsoleHandler.level = WARNING
java.util.logging.ConsoleHandler.formatter = org.jbpm.internal.log.LogFormatter

org.jbpm.level=WARNING
# org.jbpm.pvm.internal.tx.level=FINE
# org.jbpm.pvm.internal.wire.level=FINE
# org.jbpm.pvm.internal.util.level=FINE

org.hibernate.level=WARNING
#org.hibernate.cfg.SettingsFactory.level=SEVERE
#org.hibernate.cfg.HbmBinder.level=SEVERE
#org.hibernate.SQL.level=FINEST
#org.hibernate.type.level=FINEST
# org.hibernate.tool.hbm2ddl.SchemaExport.level=FINEST
# org.hibernate.transaction.level=FINEST

31 sitemesh



①导入sitemesh-2.4.1.jar
②/WEB-INF/web.xml 
<?xml version ="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<web-app version ="2.5"
       xmlns="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee
      http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_2_5.xsd" >
 
  <filter >
    <filter-name >sitemesh</ filter-name>
    <filter-class> com.opensymphony.sitemesh.webapp.SiteMeshFilter</filter-class >
  </filter >

  <filter-mapping >
    <filter-name >sitemesh</ filter-name>
    <url-pattern >/*</ url-pattern>
  </filter-mapping >
 
  <welcome-file-list >
    <welcome-file >index.jsp</ welcome-file>
  </welcome-file-list >
</web-app>
③/WEB-INF/decorators.xml
<?xml version ="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1" ?>

<decorators defaultdir ="/decorators" >
   
    <decorator name="main" page="main.jsp" >
        <pattern>/*</ pattern>
    </decorator >

</decorators>
④/decorators/main.jsp
<%@ page language ="java" import="java.util.*" pageEncoding="UTF-8" %>
<%@taglib uri ="http://www.opensymphony.com/sitemesh/decorator" prefix="decorator" %>

33 处理客户的申请

cn.itheima.bean.process.Apply.java 
public class Apply {
       public static final String SUBMIT_RESUME = "申请流程已经启动，接下来提交您的自荐信" ;
      
       public static final String RESUME_WAIT = "自荐信已提交，等待审批" ;
      
       public static final String RESUME_NOPASS = "自荐信没有通过，请重新提交自荐信" ;
      
       public static final String SUBMIT_TEST = "自荐信已通过，请提交您的入学考试题" ;
      
       public static final String TEST_WAIT = "入学考试题已提交，请等待审批" ;
      
       public static final String TEST_NOPASS = "入学没有通过，请重新提交入学考试" ;
      
       public static final String CUSTOMER_OVER = "用户主动中止流程" ;
      
       public static final String EMPLOYEE_OVER = "黑马管理员中止流程" ;
      
       public static final String SUCCESS = "您已通过所有测试，恭喜入学" ;
      
       public static final String FAILURE = "很遗憾，您的入学申请没有通过" ;
      
       private String id ;
       private String title ;  //标题   格式：张三_课程名称_入学申请
       private Customer customer ;  //申请人
       private String courseName ;  //意向课程
       private Date applyTime ;      //申请时间
       private String status ;     //入学申请的状态，用常量表示
      
       private Set<Resume> resumes = new HashSet();;   //用户提交的自荐信
       private Set<Test> tests = new HashSet();;  //入学测试题
      
       private boolean close = false;  //申请是否结束
       private boolean success = false;  //申请是否成功
       private Date lastAccessTime ;    //最后访问时间
      
       private String pi ;  //和这个申请相关联的流程实例id

      
       public String getId() {
             return id ;
      }

       public void setId(String id) {
             this.id = id;
      }

       public String getTitle() {
             return title ;
      }

       public void setTitle(String title) {
             this.title = title;
      }

       public Customer getCustomer() {
             return customer ;
      }

       public void setCustomer(Customer customer) {
             this.customer = customer;
      }

       public String getCourseName() {
             return courseName ;
      }

       public void setCourseName(String courseName) {
             this.courseName = courseName;
      }


       public Date getApplyTime() {
             return applyTime ;
      }

       public void setApplyTime(Date applyTime) {
             this.applyTime = applyTime;
      }

       public String getStatus() {
             return status ;
      }

       public void setStatus(String status) {
             this.status = status;
      }

       public Set<Resume> getResumes() {
             return resumes ;
      }

       public void setResumes(Set<Resume> resumes) {
             this.resumes = resumes;
      }

       public Set<Test> getTests() {
             return tests ;
      }

       public void setTests(Set<Test> tests) {
             this.tests = tests;
      }

       public boolean isClose() {
             return close ;
      }

       public void setClose(boolean close) {
             this.close = close;
      }

       public boolean isSuccess() {
             return success ;
      }

       public void setSuccess(boolean success) {
             this.success = success;
      }

       public Date getLastAccessTime() {
             return lastAccessTime ;
      }

       public void setLastAccessTime(Date lastAccessTime) {
             this.lastAccessTime = lastAccessTime;
      }

       public String getPi() {
             return pi ;
      }

       public void setPi(String pi) {
             this.pi = pi;
      }
      
}

cn.itheima.bean.process.Resume.java
public class Resume {
       public static final String RUNTIME = "自荐信审批中";
       public static final String PASS = "自荐信审批通过";
       public static final String NOPASS = "自荐信审批没有通过";
      
       private String id;
       private String title;  //标题   如：xxx__课程名称_自荐信
       private Date uptime ;  //上传时间
       private String resumePath;   //保存地址
       private String message;   //用户留言
      
       private String approvePerson;  //审批人
       private String comment;  //审批意见
       private boolean agree = false;  //是否通过
       private Date approveTime ;  //审批时间
       private String status;  //状态
       private Apply apply ;   //属于哪个用户的申请
      
      
      
       public String getId() {
             return id ;
      }
       public void setId(String id) {
             this.id = id;
      }
       public String getTitle() {
             return title ;
      }
       public void setTitle(String title) {
             this.title = title;
      }
       public Date getUptime() {
             return uptime ;
      }
       public void setUptime(Date uptime) {
             this.uptime = uptime;
      }
       public String getResumePath() {
             return resumePath ;
      }
       public void setResumePath(String resumePath) {
             this.resumePath = resumePath;
      }
       public String getMessage() {
             return message ;
      }
       public void setMessage(String message) {
             this.message = message;
      }
       public String getApprovePerson() {
             return approvePerson ;
      }
       public void setApprovePerson(String approvePerson) {
             this.approvePerson = approvePerson;
      }
       public String getComment() {
             return comment ;
      }
       public void setComment(String comment) {
             this.comment = comment;
      }
       public boolean isAgree() {
             return agree ;
      }
       public void setAgree(boolean agree) {
             this.agree = agree;
      }
       public Date getApproveTime() {
             return approveTime ;
      }
       public void setApproveTime(Date approveTime) {
             this.approveTime = approveTime;
      }
       public String getStatus() {
             return status ;
      }
       public void setStatus(String status) {
             this.status = status;
      }
       public Apply getApply() {
             return apply ;
      }
       public void setApply(Apply apply) {
             this.apply = apply;
      }
      
}

             super(message);
             // TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
      }

cn.itheima.dao.process.impl.ApplyDaoImpl.java
public class ApplyDaoImpl implements ApplyDao {
      
       public void add(Apply apply){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "insert into apply(id,title,courseName,applyTime,status,close,success,lastAccessTime,pi,customer_id) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)" ;
                  Object params[] = {apply.getId(),apply.getTitle(),apply.getCourseName(),apply.getApplyTime(),apply.getStatus(),apply.isClose(),apply.isSuccess(),apply.getLastAccessTime(),apply.getPi(),apply.getCustomer().getId()};
                  qr.update(sql, params);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
       public Apply find(String id){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from apply where id=?" ;
                  Apply apply = (Apply) qr. query(sql, id, new BeanHandler(Apply.class ));
                   if(apply!=null){
                        sql = "select * from resume where apply_id=? order by uptime desc";
                        List list = (List) qr. query(sql, id, new BeanListHandler(Resume.class ));
                        apply.getResumes().addAll(list);
                        
                        sql = "select * from test where apply_id=? order by uptime desc";
                        list = (List) qr. query(sql, id, new BeanListHandler(Test.class ));
                        apply.getTests().addAll(list);
                        
                        sql = "select c.* from apply a,customer c where a.id=? and c.id=a.customer_id";
                        Customer customer = (Customer) qr. query(sql, id, new BeanHandler(Customer.class));
                        apply.setCustomer(customer);
                  }
                   return apply;
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
       public void update(Apply apply){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "update apply set title=?,courseName=?,applyTime=?,status=?,close=?,success=?,lastAccessTime=?,pi=? where id=?";
                  Object params[] = {apply.getTitle(),apply.getCourseName(),apply.getApplyTime(),apply.getStatus(),apply.isClose(),apply.isSuccess(),apply.getLastAccessTime(),apply.getPi(),apply.getId()};
                  qr.update(sql, params);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

       public List<Apply> findByCustomer(Customer customer) {
            
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from apply where customer_id=?";
                  List<Apply> list = (List<Apply>) qr. query(sql, customer.getId(), new BeanListHandler(Apply.class));
                   for(Apply apply : list){
                        sql = "select * from resume where apply_id=? order by uptime desc";
                        List l = (List) qr. query(sql, apply.getId(), new BeanListHandler(Resume.class ));
                        apply.getResumes().addAll(l);
                        
                        sql = "select * from test where apply_id=? order by uptime desc";
                        l = (List) qr. query(sql, apply.getId(), new BeanListHandler(Test.class ));
                        apply.getTests().addAll(l);
                  }
                   return list;
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
}

cn.itheima.dao.process.impl.ResumeDaoImpl.java
public class ResumeDaoImpl implements ResumeDao {
      
       public void add(Resume resume){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "insert into resume(id,title,uptime,resumePath,message,approvePerson,comment,agree,approveTime,status,apply_id) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)" ;
                  Object params[] = {resume.getId(),resume.getTitle(),resume.getUptime(),resume.getResumePath(),resume.getMessage(),resume.getApprovePerson(),resume.getComment(),resume.isAgree(),resume.getApproveTime(),resume.getStatus(),resume.getApply().getId()};
                  qr.update(sql, params);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
       public Resume find(String id){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from resume where id=?" ;
                  Resume resume = (Resume) qr. query(sql, id, new BeanHandler(Resume.class ));
                   if(resume!=null){
                        sql = "select a.* from resume r,apply a where r.id=? and a.id=r.apply_id";
                        Apply apply = (Apply) qr. query(sql, id, new BeanHandler(Apply.class ));
                        resume.setApply(apply);
                  }
                   return resume;
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
       public List<Resume> findByApply(String apply_id){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from resume where apply_id=?" ;
                   return (List<Resume>) qr.query(sql, apply_id, new BeanListHandler(Resume.class ));
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
       public void update(Resume resume){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "update resume set title=?,uptime=?,resumePath=?,message=?,approvePerson=?,comment=?,agree=?,approveTime=?,status=?,apply_id=? where id=?" ;
                  Object params[] = {resume.getTitle(),resume.getUptime(),resume.getResumePath(),resume.getMessage(),resume.getApprovePerson(),resume.getComment(),resume.isAgree(),resume.getApproveTime(),resume.getStatus(),resume.getApply().getId(),resume.getId()};
                  qr.update(sql, params);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
}

cn.itheima.dao.process.impl.TestDaoImpl.java
public class TestDaoImpl implements TestDao {

                  qr.update(sql, params);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
       public Test find(String id){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());

                   if(test!=null){
                        sql = "select a.* from test t,apply a where t.id=? and a.id=t.apply_id";

                        test.setApply(apply);
                  }

            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
       public List<Test> findByApply(String apply_id){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from test where apply_id=?" ;
                   return (List<Test>) qr.query(sql, apply_id, new BeanListHandler(Test.class ));
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
       public void update(Test test){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "update test set title=?,uptime=?,testPath=?,message=?,approvePerson=?,comment=?,agree=?,approveTime=?,status=?,apply_id=? where id=?" ;
                  Object params[] = {test.getTitle(),test.getUptime(),test.getTestPath(),test.getMessage(),test.getApprovePerson(),test.getComment(),test.isAgree(),test.getApproveTime(),test.getStatus(),test.getApply().getId(),test.getId()};
                  qr.update(sql, params);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
}

cn.itheima.service.process.MyHandler.java
public class MyHandler implements AssignmentHandler {

       public void assign(Assignable assignable, OpenExecution execution)
                   throws Exception {

            EmployeeDao employeeDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(EmployeeDao. class);
            List<Employee> list = employeeDao.getAll();
             for(Employee employee : list){
                  assignable.addCandidateUser(employee.getId());
            }
            
      }

}

cn.itheima.service.process.ApplyService.java
//处理客户的申请
public class ApplyService {

       /**
       *
       * @param customer
       * @param courseName
       * @throws ApplyExsitException   意味着用户有未完成的申请
       */
      
       private ApplyDao applyDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(ApplyDao. class);
       private ResumeDao resumeDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(ResumeDao. class);
       private TestDao testDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(TestDao. class);
      
       public void startApply(Customer customer,String courseName) throws ApplyExsitException{
             //确认该客户没有未完成的申请
            Apply apply = findNoEndApply(customer);
             if(apply!=null){
                   throw new ApplyExsitException();
            }
             //创建申请对象，并赋值
            apply = new Apply();
            apply.setApplyTime( new Date());
            apply.setClose( false);
            apply.setCourseName(courseName);
            apply.setCustomer(customer);
            apply.setId(UUID. randomUUID().toString());
            apply.setLastAccessTime( new Date());
            apply.setStatus(Apply. SUBMIT_RESUME);
            apply.setSuccess( false);
            apply.setTitle(customer.getName() + "_" + courseName + "_入学申请" );  //  xxx_课程_入学申请
             //开启工作流程，并指定任务的的代办人
            ProcessEngine processEngine = JbpmUtils. getProcessEngine();
            Map map = new HashMap();
            map.put( "customerId", customer.getId());
            map.put( "applyId", apply.getId());
            
            ProcessInstance processInstance = processEngine.getExecutionService().startProcessInstanceByKey("test" , map);
             //通过工作流程实例获取流程的id
            apply.setPi(processInstance.getId());
             applyDao.add(apply);
      }
      
       public Task findTask(Customer customer){
            Task task = JbpmUtils.getProcessEngine().getTaskService().createTaskQuery().assignee(customer.getId()).uniqueResult();
             return task;
      }
      
       /**
       *
       * @param resume   :
       * @param customer   :
       * @param taskId   :
       *
       * WebUtils.request2Bean(request,resume)
       */
       public void doSubmitResume(Resume resume,Customer customer){
            
             //得到“提交自荐信任务”,并得到当前执行流程上绑定的申请
            Task task = JbpmUtils.getProcessEngine().getTaskService().createTaskQuery().assignee(customer.getId()).uniqueResult();
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
//通过task.getId（）方法获取到当前执行流程，其次再告诉它"applyId"，获取到开启该流程时，存到map里面的map.put("applyId", apply.getId());
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------         
             //map.put("applyId", apply.getId());
            String applyId = (String) JbpmUtils.getProcessEngine().getTaskService().getVariable(task.getId(), "applyId");
            Apply apply = applyDao.find(applyId);
            
             //1.保存自荐信到数据库
            resume.setApply(apply);
            resume.setId(UUID. randomUUID().toString());
            resume.setStatus(Resume. RUNTIME);
            resume.setTitle(customer.getName() + "自荐信");
            resume.setUptime( new Date());
             resumeDao.add(resume);
            
             //2.更改申请状态
            apply.setStatus(Apply. RESUME_WAIT);
            apply.setLastAccessTime( new Date());
             applyDao.update(apply);
            
             //3.任务结束
            JbpmUtils. getProcessEngine().getTaskService().completeTask(task.getId());
      }
      

       public void doSubmitTest(Test test,Customer customer){
            
             //得到“提交入学考试任务”,并得到当前执行流程上绑定的申请
            Task task = JbpmUtils.getProcessEngine().getTaskService().createTaskQuery().assignee(customer.getId()).uniqueResult();
            String applyId = (String) JbpmUtils.getProcessEngine().getTaskService().getVariable(task.getId(), "applyId");
            Apply apply = applyDao.find(applyId);
            
             //1.保存自荐信到数据库
            test.setApply(apply);
            test.setId(UUID. randomUUID().toString());
            test.setStatus(Test. RUNTIME);
            test.setTitle(customer.getName() + "入学考试" );
            test.setUptime( new Date());
             testDao.add(test);
            
             //2.更改申请状态
            apply.setStatus(Apply. TEST_WAIT);
            apply.setLastAccessTime( new Date());
             applyDao.update(apply);
            
             //3.任务结束
            JbpmUtils. getProcessEngine().getTaskService().completeTask(task.getId());
            
      }

       /**
       * 返回当前申请
       * @param customer
       * @return 如果没有申请，返回null
       */
       public Apply findApply(Customer customer){
            
            List<Apply> list = applyDao.findByCustomer(customer);
             for(Apply apply : list){
                   if(!apply.isClose()){
                         return apply;
                  }
            }
             return null ;
      }
      
       /**
       * 结束当前申请
       * @param applyId
       */
       public void endApply(Customer customer){
            Task task = JbpmUtils.getProcessEngine().getTaskService().createTaskQuery().assignee(customer.getId()).uniqueResult();
            String applyId = (String) JbpmUtils.getProcessEngine().getTaskService().getVariable(task.getId(), "applyId");
            Apply apply = applyDao.find(applyId);
             if(apply!=null){
                   //更改申请状态
                  apply.setStatus(Apply. CUSTOMER_OVER);
                  apply.setClose( true);
                   applyDao.update(apply);
                  
                   //结束申请流程
                  JbpmUtils. getProcessEngine().getExecutionService().endProcessInstance(apply.getPi(), ProcessInstance. STATE_ENDED);
            }
      }
      

       public Apply findNoEndApply(Customer customer){
            
            List<Apply> list = applyDao.findByCustomer(customer);//[]
             for(Apply apply : list){
                   if(!apply.isClose()){
                         return apply;
                  }
            }
             return null ;
      }
}

cn.itheima.service.ApproveService.java
//处理后台的审批
public class ApproveService {

       private ApplyDao applyDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(ApplyDao. class);
       private ResumeDao resumeDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(ResumeDao. class);
       private TestDao testDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(TestDao. class);
      
       /**
       * 得到某个员工所有待审批的自荐信
       * @param employee
       * @return
       */
       public Map<Resume,String> getAllResume(Employee employee){
            
            Map map = new HashMap();
            
             //得到员工所有待完成的自荐信审批任务
            List<Task> list = JbpmUtils.getProcessEngine().getTaskService().createTaskQuery().candidate(employee.getId()).activityName( "自荐信审批" ).list();
            
             //得到任务上关联上申请
             for(Task task : list){
                  String applyId = (String) JbpmUtils.getProcessEngine().getTaskService().getVariable(task.getId(), "applyId");
                  Apply apply = applyDao.find(applyId);
                  
                   //得到申请上的待审批的自荐信
                  Set<Resume> set = apply.getResumes();
                   for(Resume resume : set){
                         if(resume.getApprovePerson()==null){
                              map.put(resume, task.getId());
                        }
                  }
            }
             return map;
      }
      

       /**
       * resumeId  find()   resume   comment  agree
       *
       * 处理自荐信审批
       * @param employee
       * @return
       */
       public void   doResumeApproval(Employee employee,String taskId,Resume resume){
            
             //完成自荐信审批
            resume.setApprovePerson(employee.getRealname());
            resume.setApproveTime( new Date());
             if(resume.isAgree()){
                  resume.setStatus(resume. PASS);
            } else{
                  resume.setStatus(resume. NOPASS);
            }
             resumeDao.update(resume); 
            
             //更新申请状态
            Apply apply = resume.getApply();
             if(resume.isAgree()){
                  apply.setStatus(Apply. SUBMIT_TEST);
            } else{
                  apply.setStatus(Apply. RESUME_NOPASS);
            }
             applyDao.update(apply);
            
             //结束审批自荐信任务
             if(resume.isAgree()){
                  JbpmUtils. getProcessEngine().getTaskService().completeTask(taskId, "to 提交入学考试" );
            } else{
                  JbpmUtils. getProcessEngine().getTaskService().completeTask(taskId, "to 提交自荐信" );
            }
            
      }
      
       /**
       * 得到某个员工所有待审批的入学考试
       * @param employee
       * @return
       */
       public Map<Test,String> getAllTest(Employee employee){

            Map map = new HashMap();
            
             //得到员工所有待完成的自荐信审批任务
            List<Task> list = JbpmUtils.getProcessEngine().getTaskService().createTaskQuery().candidate(employee.getId()).activityName( "入学考试审批" ).list();
            
             //得到任务上关联上申请
             for(Task task : list){
                  String applyId = (String) JbpmUtils.getProcessEngine().getTaskService().getVariable(task.getId(), "applyId");
                  Apply apply = applyDao.find(applyId);
                  
                   //得到申请上的待审批的自荐信
                  Set<Test> set = apply.getTests();
                   for(Test test : set){
                         if(test.getApprovePerson()==null){
                              map.put(test, task.getId());
                        }
                  }
            }
             return map;
      }
      
       /**
       * 处理自荐信审批
       * @param employee
       * @return
       */
       public void   doTestApproval(Employee employee,String taskId,Test test){

             //完成自荐信审批
            test.setApprovePerson(employee.getRealname());
            test.setApproveTime( new Date());
             if(test.isAgree()){
                  test.setStatus(test. PASS);
            } else{
                  test.setStatus(test. NOPASS);
            }
             testDao.update(test); 
            
             //更新申请状态
            Apply apply = test.getApply();
             if(test.isAgree()){
                  apply.setStatus(Apply. SUCCESS);
                  apply.setSuccess( true);
            } else{
                  apply.setStatus(Apply. TEST_NOPASS);
            }
             applyDao.update(apply);
            
             //结束审批自荐信任务
             if(test.isAgree()){
                  JbpmUtils. getProcessEngine().getTaskService().completeTask(taskId, "to end1");
            } else{
                  JbpmUtils. getProcessEngine().getTaskService().completeTask(taskId, "to 提交入学考试" );
            }
      }
      
       public Resume findResume(String resumeId){
             return resumeDao .find(resumeId);
      }


       public Test findTest(String testId) {
             return testDao .find(testId);
      }
}

cn.itheima.web.action.commons.InitSiteAction.java
@Control("/093285092384092840928340824084320328409324809lisflsjlsdjfljfd" )
public class InitSiteAction {

       public void exec(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            initPrivilegeData();
            initJbpm();
      }
      
       @Test
       private void initJbpm(){
             new Configuration().configure("jbpm.hibernate.cfg.xml" ).buildSessionFactory();
            JbpmUtils. getProcessEngine().getRepositoryService()
                  .createDeployment()
                  .addResourceFromClasspath( "test.jpdl.xml")
                  .addResourceFromClasspath( "test.png")
                  .deploy();
      }
      
       //md5  111111 彩虹碰撞 11111    1287287128172817
       private void initPrivilegeData(){
            
            SecurityService securityService = new SecurityService();
            
             //初始化一个管理员
            Role role = securityService.findRoleByName( "管理员");
             if(role==null){
                  role = new Role();
                  role.setName( "管理员");
                  securityService.addRole(role);
            }
            
            Employee employee = securityService.findEmployeeByName("admin" );
             if(employee==null){
                  employee = new Employee();
                  employee.setPassword( "111111");
                  employee.setRealname( "admin");
                  employee.setUsername( "admin");
                  
                  securityService.addEmployee(employee);
                  securityService.updateEmployeeRole(employee.getId(), new String[]{role.getId()});
            }
            
             //得到所有action
            Map<String,Object> map = ControllerServlet. getActions();
             for(Map.Entry<String, Object> entry : map.entrySet()){
                  Object action = entry.getValue();
                  Method methods[] = action.getClass().getMethods();
                   for(Method method : methods){
                         Permission permission = method.getAnnotation(Permission .class);
                         if(permission!=null){
                              String modelName = permission.modelName();
                              String privilegeName = permission.privilegeName();
                              Privilege privilege = securityService.findPrivilegeByName(modelName, privilegeName);
                               if(privilege==null){
                                    privilege = new Privilege();
                                    privilege.setModelName(modelName);
                                    privilege.setPrivilegeName(privilegeName);
                                    securityService.addPrivilege(privilege);
                                    securityService.updateRolePrivilegeByInit(role.getId(), new String[]{privilege.getId()});
                              }
                        }
                  }
            }
      }
}

cn.itheima.web.filter.CheckCustomerLoginFilter.java
public class CheckCustomerLoginFilter implements Filter {

       public void destroy() {

      }

       public void doFilter(ServletRequest req, ServletResponse resp,
                  FilterChain chain) throws IOException, ServletException {

            HttpServletRequest request = (HttpServletRequest) req;
            HttpServletResponse response = (HttpServletResponse) resp;
            
            Customer customer = (Customer) request.getSession().getAttribute("customer" );
             if(customer==null){
                  response.sendRedirect(request.getContextPath() + "/customerLogin.do" );
                   return;
            }
            chain.doFilter(request, response);
            
      }
       public void init(FilterConfig filterConfig) throws ServletException {

      }

}

cn.itheima.web.action.process.CustomerLoginAction.java
@Control("/customerLogin" )
public class CustomerLoginAction {
      
       public void exec(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/process/customer/login.jsp" ).forward(request, response );
      }
      

       public void login(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            String name = request.getParameter( "name");
            String cellphone = request.getParameter( "cellphone");
            
            CustomerService customerService = new CustomerService();
            Customer customer = customerService.findCustomer(name,cellphone);
             if(customer==null){
                  request.setAttribute( "message", "用户名或手机号错误！" );
                  request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/process/customer/login.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
                   return;
            }
            request.getSession().setAttribute( "customer", customer);
            response.sendRedirect(request.getContextPath() + "/process/index.do" );
      }
}

cn.itheima.dao.customer.CustomerDao.java
public interface CustomerDao {
       void add(Customer c);
      
      Customer find(String id);
      
       void delete(String id);
      
      List getAll();

      QueryResult pageQuery( int startindex, int pagesize, String where,
                  Object[] whereParams);

      QueryResult pageQuery( int startindex, int pagesize);

      QueryResult pageQuery(String where, Object[] whereParams);

      Customer findCustomer(String name, String cellphone);
}

cn.itheima.dao.customer.CustomerDaoImpl.java
public class CustomerDaoImpl implements CustomerDao {

       public void add(Customer c) {
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "insert into customer(id,name,gender,cellphone,qq,email,address,infoSource,customerStatus,message,regTime) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)" ;
                  Object params[] = {c.getId(),c.getName(),c.getGender(),c.getCellphone(),c.getQq(),c.getEmail(),c.getAddress(),c.getInfoSource(),c.getCustomerStatus(),c.getMessage(),c.getRegTime()};
                  qr.update(sql,params);
            } catch(Exception e){
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

       public void delete(String id) {
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "delete from customer where id=?" ;
                  qr.update(sql, id);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

       public Customer find(String id) {
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from customer where id=?" ;
                   return (Customer) qr.query(sql, id, new BeanHandler(Customer.class ));
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

       public List getAll(){
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from customer";
                   return (List) qr.query(sql, new BeanListHandler(Customer.class ));
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

       // where = "where name=? and regTime>? and regTIme<?"
       public QueryResult pageQuery(int startindex,int pagesize,String where,Object whereParams[]){
            
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  QueryResult queryResult = new QueryResult();
                  List list = null;
                   int totalrecord = 0;
                  String sql = null;
                  
                   if(where==null){
                         //没带条件
                         if(startindex<0){
                               //没条件又不分页
                              sql =  "select * from customer";
                              list = (List) qr.query(sql, new BeanListHandler(Customer.class ));
                        } else{
                               //没条件分页
                              sql =  "select * from customer limit ?,?" ;
                              list = (List) qr. query(sql,new Object[]{startindex,pagesize}, new BeanListHandler(Customer.class));
                        }
                        sql = "select count(*) from customer" ;
                        totalrecord = ((Long)qr.query(sql, new ScalarHandler())).intValue();
                  } else{
                         //带了条件
                         if(startindex<0){
                               //有条件，不分页
                              sql = "select * from customer " + where;
                              list = (List) qr. query(sql, whereParams, new BeanListHandler(Customer.class));
                        } else{
                               //有条件，分页
                              sql = "select * from customer " + where + " limit ?,?";
                              Object params[] = new Object[whereParams.length + 2];
                               for(int i=0;i<whereParams.length;i++){
                                    params[i] = whereParams[i];
                              }
                              params[params. length-2] = startindex;
                              params[params. length-1] = pagesize;
                              
                              list = (List) qr. query(sql, params, new BeanListHandler(Customer.class ));
                        }
                        sql = "select count(*) from customer " + where;
                        totalrecord = ((Long)qr. query(sql, whereParams, new ScalarHandler())).intValue();
                  }
                  
                  queryResult.setList(list);
                  queryResult.setTotalrecord(totalrecord);
                   return queryResult;
            
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }
      
       public QueryResult pageQuery(String where,Object whereParams[]){
             return pageQuery(-1,-1,where,whereParams);
      }
      
       public QueryResult pageQuery(int startindex,int pagesize){
             return pageQuery(startindex, pagesize,null,null);
      }
      
       public QueryResult pageQuery(){
             return pageQuery(-1, -1,null,null);
      }

       public Customer findCustomer(String name, String cellphone) {
             try{
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                  String sql = "select * from customer where name=? and cellphone=?";
                   return (Customer) qr.query(sql, new Object[]{name,cellphone}, new BeanHandler(Customer.class));
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new DaoException(e);
            }
      }

}

cn.itheima.service.customer.CustomerService.java
public class CustomerService {

       private CustomerDao customerDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(CustomerDao. class);
       private CustomerStatusDao customerStatusDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(CustomerStatusDao. class);
       private InfoSourceDao infoSourceDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(InfoSourceDao. class);
      
       public void addCustomer(Customer customer){
            customer.setId(UUID. randomUUID().toString());
             customerDao.add(customer);
      }
      
       public Customer findCustomer(String id){
             return customerDao .find(id);
      }
      
       public PageBean pageQuery(PageInfo pageInfo,String where,Object whereParams[]){
            
            QueryResult queryResult = customerDao.pageQuery(pageInfo.getStartindex(), pageInfo.getPagesize(), where, whereParams);
            
            PageBean pageBean = new PageBean();
            pageBean.setCurrentpage(pageInfo.getCurrentpage());
            pageBean.setList(queryResult.getList());
            pageBean.setPagesize(pageInfo.getPagesize());
            pageBean.setTotalrecord(queryResult.getTotalrecord());
            
             return pageBean;
      }
      
       public PageBean pageQuery(PageInfo pageInfo){
            
            QueryResult queryResult = customerDao.pageQuery(pageInfo.getStartindex(), pageInfo.getPagesize());
            
            PageBean pageBean = new PageBean();
            pageBean.setCurrentpage(pageInfo.getCurrentpage());
            pageBean.setList(queryResult.getList());
            pageBean.setPagesize(pageInfo.getPagesize());
            pageBean.setTotalrecord(queryResult.getTotalrecord());
            
             return pageBean;
      }

       public PageBean pageQuery(String where,Object whereParams[]){
            
            QueryResult queryResult = customerDao.pageQuery(where, whereParams);
            
            PageBean pageBean = new PageBean();
            pageBean.setList(queryResult.getList());
            pageBean.setTotalrecord(queryResult.getTotalrecord());
            
             return pageBean;
      }

       //提供客户状态相关的服务
       public void addCustomerStatus(CustomerStatus c){
            c.setId(UUID. randomUUID().toString());
             customerStatusDao.add(c);
      }
      
       public CustomerStatus findCustomerStatus(String id){
             return customerStatusDao .find(id);
      }
      
       public List getAllCustomerStatus(){
             return customerStatusDao .getAll();
      }
      
       //提供信息来源相关的服务
       public void addInfoSource(InfoSource infoSource){
            infoSource.setId(UUID. randomUUID().toString());
             infoSourceDao.add(infoSource);
      }
      
       public InfoSource findInfoSource(String id){
             return infoSourceDao .find(id);
      }
      
       public List getAllInfoSource(){
             return infoSourceDao .getAll();
      }

       public Customer findCustomer(String name, String cellphone) {
             return customerDao .findCustomer(name,cellphone);
      }
      
}

cn.itheima.web.action.process.ApplyAction.java
@Control("/process/apply" )
public class ApplyAction {

       private ApplyService applyService = new ApplyService();
      
       public void apply(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/process/customer/apply.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      }
      

       public void doApply(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            Customer customer = (Customer) request.getSession().getAttribute("customer" );
            String courseName = request.getParameter( "courseName");
             try{
                   applyService.startApply(customer, courseName);
                  request.setAttribute( "message", "已开启黑马入学申请！！" );
            } catch (ApplyExsitException e) {
                  request.setAttribute( "message", "有未完成的申请,不要开启新的申请" );
            }
            request.setAttribute( "returnURL", request.getContextPath() + "/process/apply.do?method=findApply" );
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/process/customer/message.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      
      }
      

       public void findApply(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            Customer customer = (Customer) request.getSession().getAttribute("customer" );
            Apply apply = applyService.findApply(customer);
            request.setAttribute( "apply", apply);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/process/customer/applyInfo.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      
      }
      

       public void findMyTask(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            
            Customer customer = (Customer) request.getSession().getAttribute("customer" );
            Task task = applyService.findTask(customer);
             if(task==null){
                  Apply apply = applyService.findApply(customer);
                   if(apply.isSuccess()){
                        request.setAttribute( "message", "您已取得入学名额，请结束申请！！" );
                  } else{
                        request.setAttribute( "message", "您的申请正在审批，或您当前没有需要做的任务！！" );
                  }
                  request.setAttribute( "returnURL", request.getContextPath() + "/process/apply.do?method=findApply" );
                  request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/process/customer/message.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
                   return;
            }
             if(task.getName().equals("提交自荐信" )){
                  request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/process/customer/submitResume.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
            } else if (task.getName().equals("提交入学考试")){
                  request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/process/customer/submitTest.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
            
            }
      
      }
      

       //servlet2.4  setvlet3
       public void doSubmitResume(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            
            String upPath = request.getSession().getServletContext().getRealPath("/WEB-INF/upfile" );
            Map<String,String> map = WebUtils. doUpload(request,upPath);
            
            Resume resume = new Resume();
            resume.setMessage(map.get( "message"));
            resume.setResumePath(map.get( "path"));
            
            
            Customer customer = (Customer) request.getSession().getAttribute("customer" );
             applyService.doSubmitResume(resume, customer);
            request.setAttribute( "message", "提交自荐信成功,请耐心等待审批" );
            request.setAttribute( "returnURL", request.getContextPath() + "/process/apply.do?method=findApply" );
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/process/customer/message.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
            
      }
      

       //servlet2.4  setvlet3
       public void doSubmitTest(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            
            String upPath = request.getSession().getServletContext().getRealPath("/WEB-INF/upfile" );
            Map<String,String> map = WebUtils. doUpload(request,upPath);
            
            Test test = new Test();
            test.setMessage(map.get( "message"));
            test.setTestPath(map.get( "path"));
            
            
            Customer customer = (Customer) request.getSession().getAttribute("customer" );
             applyService.doSubmitTest(test, customer);
            request.setAttribute( "message", "提交入学考试成功,请耐心等待审批" );
            request.setAttribute( "returnURL", request.getContextPath() + "/process/apply.do?method=findApply" );
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/process/customer/message.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
            
      }
      
}

cn.itheima.utils.WebUtils.java
public class WebUtils {

       public static <T> T request2Bean(HttpServletRequest request,Class<T> clazz) {
            
             try{
                  Map map = request.getParameterMap();
                  T bean = clazz.newInstance();
                  BeanUtils. populate(bean, map);
                   return bean;
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }
      }

       public static Map doUpload(HttpServletRequest request,String upPath) {
            Map map = new HashMap();
             try{
                  DiskFileItemFactory factory = new DiskFileItemFactory();
                  ServletFileUpload upload = new ServletFileUpload(factory);
                  List<FileItem> list = upload.parseRequest(request);
                   for(FileItem item : list){
                         if(item.isFormField()){
                              String fieldName = item.getFieldName();
                              String fieldValue = item.getString("UTF-8" );
                              map.put(fieldName, fieldValue);
                        } else{
                              String name = item.getName();    //上传文件名  c:\\sdfsfd\sdfsd\1.doc    1.doc
                              
                              name = name.substring(name.lastIndexOf("\\" )+1);
                              InputStream in = item.getInputStream();
                              
                              String path = upPath + "\\" + UUID.randomUUID().toString()+ "_" + name;
                              FileOutputStream out = new FileOutputStream(path);
                              
                               int len = 0;
                               byte buffer[] = new byte[1024];
                               while((len=in.read(buffer))>0){
                                    out.write(buffer, 0, len);
                              }
                              
                              out.close();
                              in.close();
                              item.delete();
                              map.put( "path", path);
                        }
                  }
                   return map;
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }
            
            
      }

       public static void request2Object(HttpServletRequest request, Object object) {
            
            Map map = request.getParameterMap();
             try {
                  BeanUtils. populate(object, map);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                   throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }
            
      }
      
}

cn.ithiema.service.process.MyHandler.java
public class MyHandler implements AssignmentHandler {

       public void assign(Assignable assignable, OpenExecution execution)
                   throws Exception {

            EmployeeDao employeeDao = DaoFactory.getInstance().createDao(EmployeeDao. class);
            List<Employee> list = employeeDao.getAll();
             for(Employee employee : list){
                  assignable.addCandidateUser(employee.getId());
            }
            
      }

}

cn.itheima.web.action.process.ApproveAction.java
@Control("/control/process/approval" )
public class ApproveAction {

       private ApproveService approveService = new ApproveService();
      
       public void resumeList(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            Employee employee = (Employee) request.getSession().getAttribute("employee" );
            Map<Resume, String> map = approveService.getAllResume(employee);
            request.setAttribute( "map", map);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/process/approve/resumeList.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      
      }

       public void resumeApproval(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/process/approve/resumeApproval.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      
      }

       public void doResumeApproval(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            String resumeId = request.getParameter( "resumeId");
            String taskId = request.getParameter( "taskId");
            Resume resume = approveService.findResume(resumeId);
            WebUtils. request2Object(request, resume);
            
            Employee employee = (Employee) request.getSession().getAttribute("employee" );
             approveService.doResumeApproval(employee, taskId, resume);
            
            request.setAttribute( "message", "审批完成!" );
            request.setAttribute( "returnURL", request.getContextPath() + "/control/process/approval.do?method=resumeList" );
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/commons/message.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      
      }
      
       public void testList(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            Employee employee = (Employee) request.getSession().getAttribute("employee" );
            Map<Test, String> map = approveService.getAllTest(employee);
            request.setAttribute( "map", map);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/process/approve/testList.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      
      }

       public void testApproval(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/process/approve/testApproval.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      
      }

       public void doTestApproval(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            String testId = request.getParameter( "testId");
            String taskId = request.getParameter( "taskId");
            Test test = approveService.findTest(testId);
            WebUtils. request2Object(request, test);
            
            Employee employee = (Employee) request.getSession().getAttribute("employee" );

            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/commons/message.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
      
      }
