39 通过远程访问自动创建表以及初始化admin

cn.itheima.web.action.commons.InitSiteAction.java
@Control("/093285092384092840928340824084320328409324809lisflsjlsdjfljfd" )
public class InitSiteAction {

       public void exec(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception{
            
            response.setCharacterEncoding( "UTF-8");
            response.setContentType( "text/html;charset=UTF-8");
             try{
                  initSchema(request);
                  initPrivilegeData();
                  initJbpm();
                  request.setAttribute( "message", "初始化成功！" );
                  request.getRequestDispatcher( "/WEB-INF/pages/commons/message.jsp" ).forward(request, response);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                  response.getWriter().write(e.getMessage());
            }
      }
      
       private void initJbpm(){
             new Configuration().configure("jbpm.hibernate.cfg.xml" ).buildSessionFactory();
            JbpmUtils. getProcessEngine().getRepositoryService()
                  .createDeployment()
                  .addResourceFromClasspath( "test.jpdl.xml")
                  .addResourceFromClasspath( "test.png")
                  .deploy();
      }
      
       public void initSchema(HttpServletRequest request){
            String file = request.getSession().getServletContext().getRealPath("/WEB-INF/classes/db.sql" );
             //   /c:\tomcat\......
             //file = file.substring(1);
            String command = "cmd /c mysql -uroot -proot <" + file;
             try {
                  Process process = Runtime. getRuntime().exec(command);
                  InputStream in = process.getErrorStream();
                   int len = 0;
                   byte buffer[] = new byte[1024];
                  StringBuffer sb = new StringBuffer();
                   while((len=in.read(buffer))>0){
                        sb.append( new String(buffer,0,len));
                  }
                  String error = sb.toString();
                   if(error.length()>0){
                         throw new RuntimeException(error);
                  }
                  
            } catch (IOException e) {
                   throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }
      }
      
       //md5  111111 彩虹碰撞 11111    1287287128172817
       private void initPrivilegeData(){
            
            SecurityService securityService = new SecurityService();
            
             //初始化一个管理员
            Role role = securityService.findRoleByName( "管理员");
             if(role==null){
                  role = new Role();
                  role.setName( "管理员");
                  securityService.addRole(role);
            }
            
            Employee employee = securityService.findEmployeeByName("admin" );
             if(employee==null){
                  employee = new Employee();
                  employee.setPassword( "111111");
                  employee.setRealname( "admin");
                  employee.setUsername( "admin");
                  
                  securityService.addEmployee(employee);
                  securityService.updateEmployeeRole(employee.getId(), new String[]{role.getId()});
            }
            
             //得到所有action
            Map<String,Object> map = ControllerServlet. getActions();
             for(Map.Entry<String, Object> entry : map.entrySet()){
                  Object action = entry.getValue();
                  Method methods[] = action.getClass().getMethods();
                   for(Method method : methods){
                         Permission permission = method.getAnnotation(Permission .class);
                         if(permission!=null){
                              String modelName = permission.modelName();
                              String privilegeName = permission.privilegeName();
                              Privilege privilege = securityService.findPrivilegeByName(modelName, privilegeName);
                               if(privilege==null){
                                    privilege = new Privilege();
                                    privilege.setModelName(modelName);
                                    privilege.setPrivilegeName(privilegeName);
                                    securityService.addPrivilege(privilege);
                                    securityService.updateRolePrivilegeByInit(role.getId(), new String[]{privilege.getId()});
                              }
                        }
                  }
            }
      }
}

41 xtree

1、树状节点的特点：
①每一个节点都有一个左右值。
②如果右值-左值=1，则代表当前节点为叶子节点。
③如果右值-左值>1，则代表当前节点有孩子节点，值在左右值之间的所有节点，即为当前结点的所有孩子节点。

2、数据库表设计
create table category
(
     id varchar(40) primary key,
     name varchar(200),
     lft int,
     rgt int
);

insert into category values('1','商品',1,18);

insert into category values('4','笔记本',12,17);
insert into category values('5','长虹',3,4);
insert into category values('6','索尼',5,6);
insert into category values('7','西门子',9,10);
insert into category values('8','thinkpad',13,14);
insert into category values('9','dell',15,16);

问题，为了在页面中显示树状结构，需要得到所有节点，以及每个节点在树中的层次。
select child.*,count(child.name) as depth from category parent,category child where child.lft>=parent.lft and child.rgt<=parent.rgt group by child.name order by child.lft;

cn.itheima.bean.Category.java;
public class Category {
       private String id ;
       private String name ;
       private int lft ;
       private int rgt ;
       private int depth ;
       private List<Category> parent = new ArrayList();
      
       public String getId() {
             return id ;
      }
       public void setId(String id) {
             this.id = id;
      }
       public String getName() {
             return name ;
      }
       public void setName(String name) {
             this.name = name;
      }
       public int getLft() {
             return lft ;
      }
       public void setLft(int lft) {
             this.lft = lft;
      }
       public int getRgt() {
             return rgt ;
      }
       public void setRgt(int rgt) {
             this.rgt = rgt;
      }
       public int getDepth() {
             return depth ;
      }
       public void setDepth(int depth) {
             this.depth = depth;
      }
       public List<Category> getParent() {
             return parent ;
      }
       public void setParent(List<Category> parent) {
             this.parent = parent;
      }
}

cn.itheima.bean.CategoryDao.java
public class CategoryDao {

       public List<Category> getAll(){
            
            QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
             String sql = "select child.*,count(child.name) as depth from category parent,category child where child.lft>=parent.lft and child.rgt<=parent.rgt group by child.name order by child.lft;";
             try {
                   return (List<Category>) qr.query(sql, new BeanListHandler(Category.class ));
            } catch (SQLException e) {
                   throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }
      }

       public Category find(String parentId) {
             try {
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                   String sql = "select * from category where id=?";
                  Category c = (Category) qr. query(sql, parentId,new BeanHandler(Category.class ));
                  
                  sql = "select * from category where lft<? and rgt>?" ;
                  Object params[] = {c.getLft(),c.getRgt()};
                  List list = (List) qr. query(sql, params,new BeanListHandler(Category.class ));
                  c.setParent(list);
                   return c;
            } catch (SQLException e) {
                   throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }
      }

       public void updateLft(int parentRgt) {
             try {
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                   String sql = "update category set lft=lft+2 where lft>=?";
                  qr.update(sql, parentRgt);
            } catch (SQLException e) {
                   throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }
      }

       public void updateRgt(int parentRgt) {
             try {
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                   String sql = "update category set rgt=rgt+2 where rgt>=?";
                  qr.update(sql, parentRgt);
            } catch (SQLException e) {
                   throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }
      }

       public void add(Category child) {
             try {
                  QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtils.getDataSource());
                   String sql = "insert into category(id,name,lft,rgt) values(?,?,?,?)";
                  qr.update(sql, new Object[]{child.getId(),child.getName(),child.getLft(),child.getRgt()});
            } catch (SQLException e) {
                   throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }
      }
      
}

cn.itheima.service.CategoryService.java
public class CategoryService {
      
       private CategoryDao categoryDao = new CategoryDao();
       public List getAllCategory(){
             return categoryDao .getAll();
      }
       public Category findCategory(String parentId) {
             // TODO Auto-generated method stub
             return categoryDao .find(parentId);
      }
       public void addChild(String parentId, String name) {

            Category parent = categoryDao.find(parentId);
            
            Category child = new Category();
            child.setId(UUID. randomUUID().toString());
            child.setName(name);
            child.setLft(parent.getRgt());
            child.setRgt(parent.getRgt()+1);
            
             //为添加子节点，先挪位置
             //update category set rgt=rgt+2 where rgt>=?;
             //update category set lft=lft+2 where lft>=?;
            
             categoryDao.updateLft(parent.getRgt());
             categoryDao.updateRgt(parent.getRgt());
             categoryDao.add(child);
            
            
      }
      
}

cn.itheima.web.ListCategoryServlet.java
public class ListCategoryServlet extends HttpServlet {

       public void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
                   throws ServletException, IOException {
            
            CategoryService categoryService = new CategoryService();
            List list = categoryService.getAllCategory();
            request.setAttribute( "list", list);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/listCategory.jsp").forward(request, response);
      }

       public void doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
                   throws ServletException, IOException {
            doGet(request, response);
      }

}

listCategory.jsp
<%@ page language ="java" import="java.util.*" pageEncoding="UTF-8" %>
<%@taglib uri ="http://java.sun.com/jsp/jstl/core" prefix="c" %>
<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN">
<html>
  <head >
    <title >My JSP 'listCategory.jsp' starting page</title >
    <script src=" ${pageContext.request.contextPath}/js/xtree.js" ></script>
       <link type ="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href=" ${pageContext.request.contextPath}/js/xtree.css" >
  </head >
 
  <body >
    <script type="text/javascript" >
          <c:forEach var="c" items="${list}">
            <c: if test="${c.depth==1}" >
                   var tree = new WebFXTree('${c.name}');
                  tree.action = "${pageContext.request.contextPath}/servlet/AddCategoryServlet?parentId=${c.id}" ;
                  tree.target = "right";
            </c: if>
            <c: if test="${c.depth==2}" >
                   var node${ c.depth} = new WebFXTreeItem( '${c.name}');
                  node$ {c.depth }.action = "${pageContext.request.contextPath}/servlet/AddCategoryServlet?parentId=${c.id}" ;
                  node$ {c.depth }.target = "right";
                  tree.add(node$ {c.depth });
            </c: if>
            <c: if test="${c.depth>2}" >
                   var node${ c.depth} = new WebFXTreeItem( '${c.name}');
                  node$ {c.depth }.action = "${pageContext.request.contextPath}/servlet/AddCategoryServlet?parentId=${c.id}" ;
                  node$ {c.depth }.target = "right";
                  node$ {c.depth-1 }.add(node$ {c.depth });
            </c: if>
          </c:forEach>
         
          document.write(tree);
    </script >
  </body >
</html>

com.itheima.web.AddCategoryServlet.java
public class AddCategoryServlet extends HttpServlet {

       public void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
                   throws ServletException, IOException {

            String parentId = request.getParameter( "parentId");
            CategoryService categoryService = new CategoryService();
            Category parent = categoryService.findCategory(parentId);
            
            
            request.setAttribute( "current", parent);
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/addCategory.jsp").forward(request, response);
            
      }

       public void doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
                   throws ServletException, IOException {
            
            request.setCharacterEncoding( "UTF-8");
            
            String parentId = request.getParameter( "parentId");
            String name = request.getParameter( "name");
            
            CategoryService categoryService = new CategoryService();
            categoryService.addChild(parentId,name);
            request.setAttribute( "message", "添加成功" );
            request.getRequestDispatcher( "/message.jsp").forward(request, response);
            
      }

}
